title: Go-Jek 将和日本零售商 Aeon 在移动支付和商品配送方面开展合作

description: <h3 label="二级标题">大公司</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149770" target="_blank">美团计划针对送货服务与瑞幸咖啡合作</a></p><p>据《南华早报》报道，知情人士透露，瑞幸咖啡计划与美团点评展开合作，通过后者的外卖网络向客户配送咖啡和其他食品。知情人士表示，如果双方的合作得以推进，用户便可在国内20多个城市通过美团外卖平台购买瑞幸的产品。两家公司的发言人均拒绝对此置评。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149738" target="_blank">百度调整架构：整合技术体系，智能云事业部升级为事业群组</a></p><p>36氪讯，百度宣布技术体系架构整合，ABC智能云事业部升级为智能云事业群组（ACG），同时承载人工智能toB业务和云业务，由尹世明负责，向张亚勤汇报，张亚勤同时继续负责EBG和IDG。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149791" target="_blank">金立财务总监何大兵否认金立拟先破产清算</a></p><p>据腾讯一线，此前有媒体援引金立一位知情人士消息称，金立财务总监何大兵今晨在内部宣布，为了给破产重组争取更多时间，金立打算先申请破产清算，然后和债权人沟通破产重组的方案——等所有债权人达成一致同意的重组方案，就走破产重组的流程。金立高管之一李健向何大兵本人核实后回复称：“何总说他没有在哪里宣布过这样的内容。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149784" target="_blank">红黄蓝公司宣布1200万美股回购计划</a></p><p>据财联社，红黄蓝教育股份有限公司今日宣布，董事会批准了一项股份回购计划，公司可在未来12个月回购总价值为1200万美元美国存托股股份。根据该计划，公司可以现行市场价格在公开市场进行购买或在非公开市场进行协商交易。红黄蓝相关负责人表示，后续将根据市场情况在回购期限内实施此项回购计划。并会继续推行核心员工持股计划。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149728" target="_blank">京东数科：刘强东持股或超25%，仍是实际控制人</a></p><p>据第一财经，刘强东分别通过持有宿迁泰合四方投资咨询有限公司99%股权和宿迁大荣恒元管理顾问有限公司100%股权，合计持有东泰锦荣70%的股权，加上他以自然人身份持有的14.20%股份，刘强东持有京东数科超过25%的股份，从而对京东数科形成实际控制。对此，相关人士表示暂不回应股权问题。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149706" target="_blank">美团点评：王慧文个人公司所持美团股份转让至家族控股公司</a></p><p>36氪讯，美团点评今天对外发布公告称，美团点评已向香港联合交易所申请，不用再严格遵守上市规则第8A.18（1）条。原因是为了促成美团点评执行董事兼高级副总裁王慧文将一家其全资拥有的公司的全部已发行股本，转让至由王慧文以王慧文及其家族利益成立的家族信托的信托人全资拥有的中间控股公司。美团方面称，公司已申请豁免，而豁免已按以下基准授出，即王慧文仍保留于该等A类普通股的实益权益，且于信托安排下能够控制该等A类普通股附有的投票权。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149768" target="_blank">支付宝将向商业生态伙伴开放核心风控技术</a></p><p>据联商网，商业生态安全联盟今日在杭州成立。支付宝宣布将向商业生态伙伴开放核心风控技术，让安全科技转化为合作伙伴的解决方案，帮助整个行业更从容地应对黑灰产威胁。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149725" target="_blank">FF今日公布两台FF 91预量产车下线</a></p><p>据雷帝触网，FF今日又公布了两台FF 91预量产车下线。所谓预量产车是指，车在上市之前要进行大量的测试、改进，预量产车就是承载这个功能。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149771" target="_blank">共享汽车途歌发布退押金提醒：审核完毕后按顺序退款</a></p><p>据北京头条，途歌今日发布退押金提醒声明。该声明中称，公司会遵循退押金流程进行信息审核和处理，核实完毕后可依顺序对用户进行退款。这一流程在此前途歌给媒体的回应中明确为“20+7个工作日”。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149702" target="_blank">余额宝五年成绩单：累计赚收益1700亿，平均一天一亿元</a></p><p>据《证券日报》，余额宝披露数据：成立五年多以来，用户累计赚取收益1700亿，相当于平均每天就赚一个亿。根据此前基金公司的3季报显示，余额宝向博时、中欧等十余支基金放开后，总规模稳步上升，已接近2万亿。专家预测，年底银行等金融机构考核合拢，货币基金收益率有望上升。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149696" target="_blank">2018年扎克伯格身价缩水160亿美元</a></p><p>据腾讯科技，社交网络Facebook这一年历经了各种风波，导致股价连连下跌，马克-扎克伯格的身价到今年年底可能比年初时减少160亿美元。根据彭博亿万富翁指数，扎克伯格的净资产目前为570亿美元。尽管如此，扎克伯格还是位居世界第六位的富豪。但在今年初，他的净资产是730亿美元。到7月中旬，他的财富已经膨胀到820亿美元。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149759" target="_blank">网易严选首家线下店开业，支持线下购物线上售后</a></p><p>据新浪科技，网易严选全国首家线下店今日在杭州正式开业。线下店与线上的价格、会员帐号、库存数据、售后服务等全面互通，用户可享受到线上线下零差价、线下购物线上售后等体验。严选线下业务负责人叶树树表示，网易严选未来有入驻意向的一二线城市，除了有标准店，还会有旗舰店和社区店。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149677" target="_blank">Facebook继续挖角PayPal高管，或推加密货币相关产品</a></p><p>据新浪科技援引Cheddar，Facebook似乎距离推出加密货币相关产品更近了一步。Facebook刚刚从PayPal挖来了几名员工，让其在今年春天成立的区块链部门任职。Facebook今年5月创办了区块链部门，并任命大卫·马库斯担任负责人。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149714" target="_blank">微软拟收购自由职业工作平台Upwork</a></p><p>据亿欧，近日微软开始与自由职业工作平台Upwork开展合作，共同向客户提供企业级自由职业解决方案。USA Herald从数个消息源获悉，此举是微软可能开展的Upwork收购计划的第一步。如果此传闻为真，微软进行该收购后，可能将Upwork向全体LinekdIn用户开放，后者可通过此平台进行自由职业接单添补收入，或者成为全职自由职业者。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149705" target="_blank">苹果新专利暗示指纹识别技术将重回新款iPhone</a></p><p>据环球网，苹果在欧洲提交的一项新专利浮出水面。文件显示，苹果有意愿整合Touch ID和Face ID，其中Face ID作为第一选，Touch ID是备选，甚至Touch ID可以作为Face ID之外的增强加密或者说二重加密。当然，专利尤其是苹果的专利并不一定100%转化产品，也可能仅仅是技术储备或保护原创。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149745">华为宣布已获25份5G商业合同，营收将突破1000亿美元</a></p><p>据新浪财经，华为技术有限公司宣布，已获得了超过25份5G商业合同，在5G商业合同方面处于全球领先地位，并已出货了逾1万个5G基站。华为副董事长兼轮值CEO胡厚崑在深圳总部的一次新闻发布会上表示，“预计今年公司总营收将超过1000亿美元，这将是我们公司历史上的一个重大里程碑。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149740">雷佳音第一天去支付宝上班：接10个客服电话7个当是骗子</a></p><p>36氪讯，支付宝官方宣布，会员频道全面升级，更名为“支付宝会员”，提供100多项权益兑换。与此同时，官方还宣布，知名影视演员雷佳音成为支付宝会员体验官，花名“阿拉雷”。此次支付宝升级了会员频道，上支付宝搜索“支付宝会员”，即可通过积分兑换相关权益，涵盖精、视、康、玩、美、金、红、学、鲤、吃十大类别。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18102921/ubwlu8kxwjnoofnd.png!heading" data-img-size-val="1184,1064"/></p><h3 label="二级标题">投融资</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149777" target="_blank">印度网约车公司Ola将向踏板车共享创企Vogo投资1亿美元</a></p><p>据腾讯科技援引外媒，印度网约车公司Ola表示，该公司将向印度踏板车共享初创企业Vogo投资1亿美元，并将后者的两轮车添加到Ola的应用程序中，以扩大其业务范围。Vogo主要在印度南部城市提供服务，该公司将利用这笔资金将其拥有车辆扩大到10万辆。Vogo表示，已有超过10万名用户使用其踏板车通勤了2000余万公里。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149723" target="_blank">VoxelCloud体素科技完成5000万美元B轮融资</a></p><p>36氪讯，VoxelCloud体素科技宣布其于今年9月完成5000万美元B轮融资，本轮由东方弘泰领投，红杉资本、清松资本、汉富资本跟投，奇迹资本担任独家财务顾问。本轮资金主要用于医疗影像AI解决方案产品的各国市场准入注册以及临床落地。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149760" target="_blank">“e换电”完成超3亿元的B轮融资，中美绿色基金领投</a></p><p>据亿欧，轻型电动车共享锂电池品牌e换电今日在北京举办了新品暨融资发布会，CEO黄嘉曦宣布公司已完成超过3亿元的B轮融资。该轮融资由中美绿色基金领投，三星风投、KIP和Mirae Asset跟投，老股东GGV纪源资本、云启资本、Translink Capital和韩国现代均有参与。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149763" target="_blank">贝恩资本亚洲新基金完成募资46.5亿美元</a></p><p>据阿思达克财经援引外媒，美国私募股权投资公司贝恩资本的新亚洲基金募资46.5亿美元，超过原本35亿至40亿美元的目标。其中，40亿美元来自外部投资者及有限合伙人，6.5亿美元来自贝恩资本和关联方。贝恩资本对消息表示不予置评。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149710" target="_blank">吉利汽车武汉分公司乘用车项目获批，总投资90.44亿</a></p><p>据盖世汽车，湖北省发展和改革委员会发布公告称， 同意浙江吉利汽车有限公司在武汉市建设武汉分公司年产15万辆乘用车项目，项目地点位于武汉市汉南区纱帽街薇湖路。相关资料显示，项目总投资90.44亿元，计划2019年初开始建设，2021年底完成。建成后将形成年产15万辆乘用车多品种混流生产能力，其中包括基本型乘用车及其它类乘用车。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149731" target="_blank">“上海劳勤”宣布已完成近亿元B轮融资</a></p><p>36氪讯，“上海劳勤”今日正式对外宣布已完成近亿元B轮融资，由东方富海、肯耐珂萨领投，真格基金、华创资本跟投。在劳勤的核心产品“WTS劳动力管理软件”中，包含了劳动力管理、人事管理、系统管理和自助管理四大功能框架。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149712" target="_blank">“惟乐教育”获数千万元A轮融资</a></p><p>36氪讯，K12教育项目平台“惟乐教育”近日宣布完成数千万元人民币A 轮融资，本轮融资由灵则资产领投，千赐资本担任本轮融资独家财务顾问。惟乐教育是专注于为校外培训机构提供课程体系搭建及运营支持的服务商。</p><h3 label="二级标题">新产品</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149761" target="_blank">腾讯发布首款带屏智能音箱</a></p><p>36氪讯，腾讯今日发布首款带屏智能音箱“腾讯叮当智能屏”，这是首款带电池的带屏智能音箱。该音箱整合了腾讯视频、QQ音乐、腾讯新闻、企鹅FM、阅文听书等腾讯系内容资源，官方售价为899元，12月24日正式发售。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149783" target="_blank">荷兰公司将推太阳能电动车，2020年正式上市销售</a></p><p>据汽车之家，近日，荷兰Lightyear新能源汽车公司宣布，将与LeasePlan车辆服务公司合作，推出旗下首款太阳能电动汽车——Lightyear One。预计首款原型车将于2019年夏天推出，并于2020年正式上市销售。目前该车的设计还处于保密阶段，但已知该车将会是一款五座轿车，采用全轮驱动动力系统。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149694" target="_blank">LG电子据称计划在2019年向市场推出可卷曲电视机</a></p><p>据新浪财经，外媒援引一位了解此事的人士表示，LG电子计划明年开始销售一款大屏幕电视机，它可以像海报一样卷起来放置，这是该公司为重振这项境况堪忧业务推出的核心产品。一位知情人士透露，与三星电子不同，LG没有计划在明年推出一款采用“可折叠”屏幕的手机。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149758" target="_blank" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">B站旗下公司哆啦哔梦将推出竖屏动画</a><br/></p><p>36氪讯，哆啦哔梦今日在B站国创动画作品发布会上宣布，将推出竖屏动画《垂直世界》。今年6月，上海幻电信息科技有限公司（B站主体公司）联合绘梦动画成立了哆啦哔梦(上海)文化传播有限公司。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149766" target="_blank">天津高速公路推出“无感支付”便捷出行</a></p><p>据新华社，12月18日10时起，天津市京津高速和津港高速全部收费站试点，开始运行高速公路人工收费车道“无感支付”业务（车牌付）。“无感支付”此前已在多地停车场得到应用：司机通过将支付账户与车牌绑定，车牌号就变成了“付款码”，车辆在进出停车场时，摄像头在识别车牌后自动抬杆、扣费。相比ETC，“无感支付”开通简单，且无需安装车载OUB设备。</p><h3 label="二级标题">今日观点</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149671" target="_blank">蔚来李斌：我不是“出行教父”，蔚来也不是小米</a></p><p>据品玩，蔚来底二款车型ES8日前发布，蔚来汽车董事长李斌表示公司是按计划推进，一年一款车。他说从蔚来身上能看到星巴克、特斯拉、小米、华为等公司的影子，“小米就是完全追求性价比，我们跟他肯定是不一样的。我们更多把服务放在第一位，但有很多借鉴思考。”对于“出行教父”说法，李斌否认道，“我肯定不是，这个词不对。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149781" target="_blank">甲骨文创始人埃里森：“正常人”都不会迁移到AWS云服务</a></p><p>据腾讯科技援引外媒，甲骨文联合创始人兼首席技术官拉里·埃里森周一表示，亚马逊可能关闭了甲骨文数据库，转而使用它自己的AWS数据库技术，但是其他“正常人”都不会这么做。在甲骨文公布第二财季财报后，埃里森在电话会议上表示：“我们在数据库领域拥有强大的技术领先地位。从技术上来说，任何正常人都不会从甲骨文数据库迁移到亚马逊数据库。”</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149754" target="_blank">业内人士：3GPP推迟5G标准冻结不影响全球5G商用部署进程</a></p><p>据中证网，近日国际标准组织3GPP主席Balazs Bertenyi表示，原计划于2018年12月冻结的R15 Late Drop版本将推迟到2019年3月，引发或将导致全球5G建设放缓的担忧。不过业内人士对记者表示，Late Drop并非运营商5G组网的主流架构，因此标准冻结推迟不会对5G商用部署产生实质影响。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149691" target="_blank">德勤中国：预计A股明年新股融资额超1400亿</a></p><p>据证券时报，德勤中国预计，A股市场明年将有110-150只新股上市，融资额约1400-1700亿元。报告认为，2019年大部分新股发行人均由中、小型制造业、技术和消费业所构成。报告指出，2018年包括上海主板、深圳中小企业板和创业板的中国内地市场，新股总数很可能达106只，融资约1402亿元。两者较2017年436只新股上市融资2304亿元，都分别大幅减少76%及39%。</p><h3 label="二级标题">其他重要新闻</h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149734" target="_blank">《汽车产业投资管理规定》审议通过，2019年1月10日起施行</a></p><p>36氪讯，新建中外合资轿车生产企业项目、新建纯电动乘用车生产企业（含现有汽车企业跨类生产纯电动乘用车）项目及其余由省级政府核准的汽车投资项目均不再实行核准管理，调整为备案管理。</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/newsflashes/149683" target="_blank">中国卡塔尔全面互免签证协定12月21日起正式生效</a></p><p>据央视网，外交部长王毅在北京同卡塔尔副首相兼外交大臣穆罕默德共同主持中卡政府间战略对话机制首次会议。双方宣布，两国全面互免签证协定从12月21日起正式生效，愿以此为契机，加快推进旅游合作，密切人文交往。</p><h3 label="二级标题">每日商业精选</h3><p>点击订阅<a href="https://36kr.com/goods/12061">每日商业精选</a>，获取今天有用有趣最有料的一图抵千言：</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18103027/ixa02l97gi5s3t4a.jpeg!heading" data-img-size-val="1240,7274"/></p><p><br/></p>
title: 氪星晚报丨美团计划与瑞幸展开配送合作​；金立财务总监否认公司拟先破产清算；红黄蓝宣布1200万美股回购计划

description: <p>文 | 36氪每日商业精选</p><h3 label="二级标题">维密大秀高光背后刻着孤独，性感“天使”已坠入看不见光的国度<br/></h3><p>曾经人人都爱的维密也不行了。据尼尔森统计，今年的维密大秀收视率创2001年以来新低，总观众数仅有327万。<br/></p><p>而今年在大秀落幕后的一个月内，维密CEO换了班，公司重启了泳装业务，在关闭旗下Henri Bendel所有门店之后，维密母公司L Brands还计划出售内衣子品牌La Senza。密集变动的背后，是维密面对市场变化的无奈。<br/></p><p>维密一度被冠以“女王”头衔，母公司CEO Leslie Wexner一度被称为......</p><blockquote><p><strong>主编点评：</strong>对服饰公司来说，转向不难，关键是有没有这个意识和决心。当性别、身份、女权、环保等千禧一代关心的议题日渐明显，此前同样主打......</p></blockquote><h3 label="二级标题">第一批Vlogger已经开始赚钱了，这个风口能带来什么机会？<br/></h3><p>微博9月发布了“Vlog博主召集令”，短视频工具VUE改名为VUE Vlog，B站推出了30天Vlog挑战。Vlog这一“Video+Blog”的内容形态正在成为新风口。而包括一闪创始人@flypig在内的第一批Vlogger已经开始通过合作品牌开始商业变现。<br/></p><p>36氪作者可欣、思齐认为，Vlog最大的特点在于“生活化”及其所代表的“人格化”，Vlog的内容更不可控，同时，信息量更大、内容浓度更高。<br/></p><p>记录生活的Vlog看似入门容易，其实并非人人友好。主要的门槛在于：......</p><blockquote><p><strong>主编点评：</strong>Vlog内容形态其实一早就有，本是垂直领域博主们偶尔制作的“调味剂”，最近被国内明星带火后，俨然成了一个大热的趋势。其实纵观......</p></blockquote><address><p>本文来自36氪付费栏目《36氪每日商业精选》——12月18日</p><p>每天不到1元，深度资讯+主编点评，省时省心高效阅读</p><p><a href="https://36kr.com/coupons/single?id=198?ktm_source=kk_feed121803_36krdaily" target="_blank" textvalue="【限时彩蛋】戳此订阅，立减10元&gt;&gt;">【限时彩蛋】戳此订阅，立减10元&gt;&gt;</a></p></address><h3><a href="https://36kr.com/goods/p/5167814?ktm_source=kk_1218content3_36krdaily" target="_blank" textvalue="已购用户戳此查看完整内容&gt;&gt;">已购用户戳此查看完整内容&gt;&gt;</a></h3><p><a href="https://36kr.com/goods/p/5167814?ktm_source=kk_1218content3_36krdaily" target="_blank"><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18102047/01kwq76s76c1es2p.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,1753"/></a><a href="https://36kr.com/coupons/single?id=198?ktm_source=kk_feed121803_36krdaily" target="_blank"><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201811/19082523/0wp5bd6gte7rgtqy.png!heading" data-img-size-val="720,3862"/></a><br/></p>
title: 深度资讯 | 维密大秀高光背后刻着孤独，性感“天使”已坠入看不见光的国度

description: <p><br/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18110802/yyd8lfs9mu5i7p0x.png!heading" data-img-size-val="720,421"/></p><p label="图片描述" classname="img-desc" class="img-desc"><font face="PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">图片来源：Autosport</font></p><p><font face="PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">今日，一张来自twitter的外媒截图席卷社交媒体：重大消息！舒马赫不再卧床不起。然而，据36氪查询</font><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">所有的舒马赫官方渠道，未获得任何权威消息表明车王的病情有重大进展。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">事实上</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">4年前，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">舒马赫家人就发布声明称其已脱离昏迷。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">那场2013年阿尔卑斯山区滑雪时发生的事故，头盔破裂伤及脑部后，舒马赫便瘫痪在床。即便如此，他所创造的91个分站赛冠军的记录至今无人打破。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">事故之后，他的妻子科琳娜对外封锁了他的消息，并向周围的亲友表示，谁泄露病情就断绝关系。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此文无意一窥车王的个人隐私，唯想表达的是：<strong>昏迷的人得以苏醒、瘫痪的人得以重新站起来，除了一些说不清的运气成分外，这背后可能有“再生医学”的功劳。</strong></span></p><p><strong>所谓“再生医学”，不是伪科学也不是神乎其神的生物科技，是指利用生物学及工程学的理论方法创造丢失或功能损害的组织和器官，使其具备正常组织和器官的机构和功能，“干细胞疗法”是再生医学的核心之一。</strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">瘫痪的成因多样，其中一项便是由于车祸、滑雪运动、不慎坠楼这些意外事故等伤及脊髓，医学术语为“脊髓损伤”（</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">spinal cord injury），不同部位的脊椎损伤会导致四肢瘫痪或半身不遂的严重后果。</span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18091759/c8tlqgoq7t8inxp0.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="300,300"/></p><p label="图片描述" classname="img-desc" class="img-desc">图片来源：openwetware.org</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">36氪曾采访<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5165199.html" target="_blank">2004年诺贝尔化学奖得主阿龙·切哈诺沃（Aaron Ciechanover）</a>讨论人类活到120岁的可能，他目前是香港中文大学切哈诺沃精准和再生医学研究院院长。在采访中，他分享了一个颈部以下瘫痪的患者，经由高剂量干细胞治疗，在运动功能上有明显改善的案例：</span></p><p>这个瘫痪的年轻人名叫Kristopher Boesen，他在美国南加州大学神经修复中心与Rancho Los Amigos国家复健中心进行了这项手术 —— 研究者将实验剂量为1千万个AST-OPC1细胞直接注射到Kris的颈髓里。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18092034/znd6mss6q54an7s8.jpeg!heading" data-img-size-val="600,402"/></p><p label="图片描述" classname="img-desc" class="img-desc">Kristopher Boesen&nbsp;</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">2天后，Boesen的手开始可以活动，几个月后，他的一个脚的脚趾也能活动了。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">南加州大学神经外科医生Charles Liu是Asterias Biotherapeutics研究项目的负责人，这家</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">美国生物技术公司主要关注颈椎损伤的患者，由于颈椎接近大脑，新神经只需要比较短的路程更容易生长。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在波士顿举行的国际干细胞研究学会（International Society for Stem Cell Research）上，该公司公布了</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">针对脊髓损伤的新型干细胞疗法AST-OPC1在6名完全瘫痪的患者中的1/2a期临床试验的最新数据，这些患者在接受了1000万个细胞注射9个月后，其中3名患者的手臂、手掌和手指运动功能出现明显的进步。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><strong>这背后的原理与周围神经系统的再生能力有关。</strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">神经系统可分为中枢神经系统和周围神经系统，脑、脊髓和视网膜神经则属于中枢神经系统。<strong>脊髓损伤时，人体内的“信号通路”被阻断，人就无法与伤口以下的躯体产生连接，进而丧失了运动功能和感觉。</strong>在临床上，大家熟悉的案例可能是外科医生将伤者的断肢、断指的神经重新接上，恢复大致的功能。同样地，在</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">周围神经系统中有一类细胞名叫雪旺细胞（Schwann），中国科学院院士苏国辉表示，雪旺细胞是</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">周围神经系统里的胶质细胞，构成了神经元生长的“微环境”，在神经元受损时，雪旺细胞表面的基膜能分泌神经营养因子，保障受损的神经元也能存活，促使神经轴突再生。由于干细胞可以分泌神经营养因子，将干细胞放进损伤的脊髓处，它们分泌的神经营养因子可以像雪旺细胞一样形成促进神经生长的微环境，有利于损伤的脊髓恢复活力。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18094746/f978vanv3ww3wxtx.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="1024,683"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">“从这个原理出发，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">苏院士说，“</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">我们主要治疗脊髓损伤的方向第一就是想办法改善微环境，第二是提高神经细胞的再生能力。”</span></p><p>目前，干细胞治疗仍然属于新兴研究领域，科学家们对脊髓损伤的了解依然不够全面，对干细胞的了解也不够。Liu博士谨慎预测Boesen的未来，目前他的恢复依然有限，无法夸大具有运动功能独立性的程度，神经组织损伤修复是极其难解决的问题。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">其他的神经再生细胞疗法也只有零星成功的案例，也不乏试验发现中风患者治疗后出现了脑瘤。这研究结果的喜忧参半让许多投资者和患者失望。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">但在生命科学领域，每一个研究总会让人对问题的复杂性有更深入的理解，解决问题办法除了谨慎的监管外，就是更为谨慎的临床试验 ——&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">大规模双盲对照临床试验的结果才能让临床医生接受干细胞确实能治疗脊髓损伤这一可能。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">2017年8月，64岁的脊髓损伤、下肢瘫痪患者陈双喜，在</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">中山大学附属第三医院经过2年的间充质</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">干细胞治疗，从轮椅上站了起来，并在支具辅助下迈开脚步。目前该医院负责的国家重点研发计划正在广州、上海等地开展研究，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">希望惠及更多因脊髓损伤而瘫痪的患者 ——&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">数据显示，我国每年脊髓损伤的患者人数超过12万人。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">以此文，静待再生医学的逐步突破。</span></p>
title: 焦点分析 | 舒马赫苏醒的背后，可能有再生医学的踪迹

description: <p>韬蕴资本和乐视又撕起来了。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">今日早间，先是有消息称韬蕴资本提起了有关冻结贾跃亭先生FF股份的申诉并获得了美国法院支持的消息。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">随后，乐视控股声明称，乐视控股债务处理小组及债务主体担保人贾跃亭并未收到任何来自美国法院关于韬蕴资本的债务诉讼或相关裁决。乐视控股和韬蕴资本之间存在一系列数额巨大的经济纠纷，而非韬蕴资本所说的单方面欠账问题。在乐视与韬蕴资本达成收购易到的交易协议之后，韬蕴资本至今并未向乐视方支付任何交易对价以及完成抵债等协议约定的义务，导致了涉及金额几十亿元的经济纠纷，对此乐视方面已准备向法院提起诉讼。同时，在乐视与韬蕴资本达成收购易到的交易过程中，韬蕴资本CEO温晓东有涉嫌欺诈行为。而近期温晓东个人言论更涉嫌造谣诽谤，严重损害了贾跃亭先生本人及公司的声誉，对此乐视也保留对其个人诉讼的权利。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">随后，今日晚间，易到的股东韬蕴资本发布声明，针对乐视的“指控”逐一反驳，言辞之间颇为激烈。</span></p><h3 label="二级标题">以下是<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">对于“乐视控股债务处理小组”声明的</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">声明</span><br/></h3><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">今日，一封署名为“乐视控股债务处理小组”发布的《有关韬蕴资本与乐视控股经济纠纷的严正声明》，全文颠倒黑白、荒谬透顶，充斥着谎言与恶意，与乐视过去数年间对我司及众多投资机构所做的事情如出一辙。</span></p><p>1、乐视声明中称，“乐视控股债务处理小组及债务主体担保人贾跃亭并未收到任何来自美国法院关于韬蕴资本的债务诉讼或相关裁决”。贾先生不要再玩文字游戏了，正面面对问题吧！是不是欠了这些债？是不是BVI、加州的股份被冻结了？</p><p>2018年12月13日，加州法院经过审理下发临时限制令（TRO），冻结Faraday Future&nbsp;（FF）中贾跃亭持有的33%股权及贾跃亭加州的四处房产。</p><p>依照美国联邦法院《联邦民事诉讼规则》第4条的基本原则，我们的加州律师事务所律师每天准时两次上门送达，目前贾跃亭躲在自己豪宅中大门紧闭，拒绝接受任何文书，门禁电话打通即挂断。与此同时FF公司的前门、后门均紧闭，不接收任何文书。大概这就是乐视和贾先生所说的“未收到”吧？</p><p>关于BVI法院的诉讼和执行情况。2018年12月6日由法院书面签发了相应裁定。法院要求贾跃亭、FF Peak以及FF Top，在没有取得韬蕴资本书面事先同意的情况下，不得以任何方式转让、减损、处置、设置抵押权于其股权和资产之上。任何机构，包括BVI、开曼代理注册机构，在明知法院禁令的情况下协助贾跃亭转股，即触犯了藐视法院判决并将可能承担法律责任。2018年12月6日，上述裁定由FF Peak以及FF Top的代理人签收，裁定已经正式送达生效。</p><p>2、乐视声明中称，我司收购易到期间，未向乐视支付款项。为什么没完成抵债协议你自己心里还没点×数么？债务规模扩大的锅就甩了？易到广大司机的欠款韬蕴就要不明不白地帮你填了？在双方的交易文件中，这是一次承债式交易，乐视控股及贾跃亭在交易文件中明确承诺当时的易到债务规模是23亿，韬蕴资本入主易到过程中陆续发现这个债务规模在50亿左右。23亿变成50亿，到底是谁在欺诈？</p><p>3、乐视声明中称，我司温晓东先生在收购易到期间“有涉嫌欺诈嫌疑行为”、“个人言论更涉嫌造谣诽谤”，却都言之不明，一笔带过，这种表述逻辑完全不正常，但却很乐视。我司很期待乐视对上述表述的前因后果进行详细介绍，并随时准备打脸。</p><p>乐视表示“已准备向法院提起诉讼”、“保留对其个人诉讼的权利”。如果温晓东先生或韬蕴在和乐视的任何交易涉及到任何不法行为，欢迎诉讼，不用保留！</p><p>4、该声明的发布者“乐视债务处理小组”这到底是个什么样的存在？是一个什么组织，乐视债务处理小组成立这么久，到目前为止处理了什么债务吗？我们检索了一下，没有看到哪个债权人说债务通过这个小组得到了解决，建议更名为“乐视债务处理媒体发布小组”更为妥帖。</p><p>5、最后，送给乐视和贾先生几句话：</p><p>“严重损害了贾跃亭先生本人及公司的声誉”？难道您还有个人声誉么？难道不是自绝于中华么？之所以之前不动，是我们还希望给你机会踏实做事。但301后一切都变了，我们不会等天收你，我们其实就行！谢谢！</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">PS：按照一般的辟谣声明的写法，应该写点诸如“该文流传广泛，已严重侵害了我公司形象，诋毁我公司管理人员名誉，破坏了正常的市场秩序”之类的话，但本文没写，毕竟你们现在说的话，哪还有人会信。</span></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">韬蕴资本集团</span></p><p>乐视债权处理小组</p><p>2018年12月18日</p><p><br/></p>
title: 乐视称韬蕴资本涉嫌欺诈，后者就反过来说贾跃亭应该自绝于中华

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Is <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xjDjIWPwcPU">Wakanda</a> real? What’s up with <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fe3lpI0bi5E">that racoon on the skyscraper</a>? <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7X_WvGAhMlQ">Is it Laurel, or is it Yanny?</a> And <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=az6m9IE8h4o">who exactly is Kiki</a>?</p><p><a href="http://www.google.com/2018">Take a stroll through Google Search trends</a> and you’ll discover a lot of fun stuff about the year, from royal weddings and major news events to unexpected memes and breakthrough stars. And while the headlines of 2018 will look pretty familiar, what trended the most on Search can be quite surprising. How well do you know what the world searched for this year?</p></div></div><div class="block-video"><div class="h-c-page h-c-page--mobile-full-bleed"><div class="h-c-grid"><div class="h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col-l--12 "><div class="article-module article-video "><figure><a class="h-c-video h-c-video--marquee" data-glue-modal-disabled-on-mobile="true" data-glue-modal-trigger="uni-modal-GFvClJcC9WU-" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=GFvClJcC9WU"><div class="article-video__aspect-image" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/GOTY_YouTube_Trailer_Poster_v2.max-1000x1000.jpg);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Game of the Year preview</span></div><svg class="h-c-video__play h-c-icon h-c-icon--color-white" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-youtube-icon"></use></svg></a></figure></div></div></div></div><div class="h-c-modal--video" data-glue-modal="uni-modal-GFvClJcC9WU-" data-glue-modal-close-label="Close Dialog"><a class="glue-yt-video" data-glue-yt-video-autoplay="true" data-glue-yt-video-height="99%" data-glue-yt-video-vid="GFvClJcC9WU" data-glue-yt-video-width="100%" href="https://youtube.com/watch?v=GFvClJcC9WU" ng-cloak=""></a></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Meet <a href="http://g.co/2018game">Game of the Year</a>. Part of <a href="http://google.com/2018">Year in Search 2018</a>—our annual roundup of top trends of the past 12 months—Game of the Year is the first game based on Google Search trends that puts your knowledge of 2018 to the test in an interactive way.</p><p>The game is simple: Each player must answer a series of questions about this year’s trending searches, collecting points along the way. The questions get harder as you progress through the game. A special bonus round increases the difficulty even more. Players can also challenge their friends to test their own Google Search trendiness. </p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="Game of the Year 2018" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_images/GameOfTheYear_4_9a3xa7F.gif"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>The game’s host was built using <a href="https://cloud.google.com/">Google Cloud</a> and <a href="https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/wavenet">WaveNet</a>, Google’s text-to-speech technology powered by machine learning. Players can adjust the pitch and speed of the game host’s voice, and if a player enters their name at the start, the audio updates on the fly, providing encouragement to players as they progress through the game.</p><p>Want to test your own Google Search trendiness? You might even find the answer to the burning question on everyone’s mind: which famous Justin won the Search battle— Bieber, Timberlake, or Trudeau? Play <a href="https://gameoftheyear.withgoogle.com">Game of the Year</a> to find out.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: Test your knowledge of the year’s top trends with Game of the Year

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Six months ago we announced <a href="https://www.blog.google/technology/ai/ai-principles/">Google’s AI Principles</a>, which guide the ethical development and use of AI in our research and products. As a complement to the Principles, we also posted our <a href="https://ai.google/education/responsible-ai-practices">Responsible AI Practices</a>, a set of quarterly-updated technical recommendations and results to share with the wider AI ecosystem. Since then we’ve put in place additional initiatives and processes to ensure we live up to the Principles in practice.  </p><p>First, we want to encourage teams throughout Google to consider how and whether our AI Principles affect their projects. To that end, we’ve established several efforts:</p><p></p><ul><li>Trainings based on the “Ethics in Technology Practice” project developed at the <a href="https://www.scu.edu/ethics/focus-areas/technology-ethics/">Markkula Center for Applied Ethics</a> at Santa Clara University, with additional materials tailored to the AI Principles. The content is designed to help technical and non-technical Googlers address the multifaceted ethical issues that arise in their work. So far, more than 100 Googlers from different countries have tried out the course and in the future we plan to make it accessible for everyone across the company.<br/></li><li>AI Ethics Speaker Series with external experts across different countries, regions, and professional disciplines. So far, we’ve had eight sessions with 11 speakers, covering topics from bias in natural language processing (NLP) to the use of AI in criminal justice. <br/></li><li>We added a <a href="https://developers.google.com/machine-learning/crash-course/fairness/video-lecture">technical module on fairness</a><b></b>to our free Machine Learning Crash Course, which is available in 11 languages and has been used to train more than 21,000 Google employees. The fairness module, which is currently available in English with more languages coming soon, explores how bias can crop up in training data, and ways to identify and mitigate it.</li></ul><p></p><p>Along with these efforts to engage Googlers, we’ve established a formal review structure to assess new projects, products and deals. Thoughtful decisions require a careful and nuanced consideration of how the AI Principles (which are intentionally high-level to allow flexibility as technology and circumstances evolve) should apply, how to make tradeoffs when principles come into conflict, and how to mitigate risks for a given circumstance. The review structure consists of three core groups:</p><p></p><ul><li>A responsible innovation team that handles day-to-day operations and initial assessments. This group includes user researchers, social scientists, ethicists, human rights specialists, policy and privacy advisors, and legal experts on both a full- and part-time basis, which allows for diversity and inclusion of perspectives and disciplines. <br/></li><li>A group of senior experts from a range of disciplines across Alphabet who provide technological, functional, and application expertise. <br/></li><li>A council of senior executives to handle the most complex and difficult issues, including decisions that affect multiple products and technologies.<br/></li></ul><p></p><p>We’ve conducted more than 100 reviews so far, assessing the scale, severity, and likelihood of best- and worst-case scenarios for each product and deal. Most of these cases, like the integration of <a href="https://cloud.google.com/inclusive-ml/#fairness-in-ml-automl">guidelines for creating inclusive machine learning</a> in our Cloud AutoML products, have aligned with the Principles. We’ve modified some efforts, like <a href="https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.05162">research in visual speech recognition</a>, to clearly outline assistive benefits as well as model limitations that minimize the potential for misuse. And in a small number of product use-cases—like a <a href="https://www.blog.google/around-the-globe/google-asia/ai-social-good-asia-pacific/">general-purpose facial recognition API</a>—we’ve decided to hold off on offering functionality before working through important technology and policy questions.</p><br/><p>The variety and scope of the cases considered so far are helping us build a framework for scaling this process across Google products and technologies. This framework will include the creation of an external advisory group, comprised of experts from a variety of disciplines, to complement the internal governance and processes outlined above.</p><br/><p>We’re committed to promoting thoughtful consideration of these important issues and appreciate the work of the many teams contributing to the review process, as we continue to refine our approach.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: Google AI Principles updates, six months in
联想 Z5s 体验：水滴屏+后置三摄，一款性价比很高的千元机

description: <p>编者按：缺乏个人储蓄，海外竞争加剧，以及另一次经济衰退的威胁，使得千禧一代创业困难重重。本文作者<a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/author/stephen-harrison/">STEPHEN HARRISON</a>，原文标题<a href="https://www.theatlantic.com/business/archive/2018/12/milennial-start-up/567793/" target="_blank">Start-Ups Aren&#39;t Cool Anymore</a>。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/11092725/c4j8vkmogbi2toab.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,405"/></p><p>我在得克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校（University of Texas At Austin）参加的在职MBA项目中，课间休息时，大家讨论的话题往往是关于新的商业理念的——比如，某个可以安排未来事项的短信app（用例：提前一天编辑好给你最好的朋友的生日祝福短信）；某个不会出售你任何个人信息或不显示任何广告的社交网络（商业模式创新：月费）；或者某家位于俄克拉何马州（Oklahoma）中部气候宜人、环境优美、经济实惠的地区的酿酒厂，诸如此类。我的一位朋友曾经深受自己创业理念的启发，拿出手机，查看自己喜欢的网址是否可用，然后当场就注册了域名。</p><p>许多商学院中，类似的一幕也在上演。大多数MBA学生的年龄介于25岁至30岁之间，在所有关于创业的讨论中，他们似乎正在实现自己的创业梦。但如今，理想很丰满，现实却很骨感——创业的想法往往无法实现。当我在几周后追踪同龄人的创业建议时，我经常发现他们早就抛弃了那些想法，更倾向于稳定的公司工作。</p><p>研究表明，当前千禧一代的创业活动有所减少。《华尔街日报（Wall Street Journal）》 2015年对美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）数据的分析显示，拥有至少一家企业同时年龄低于30岁的人数比例已降至近25年来的低点。2016年， Economic Innovation Group对1200名千禧一代进行了一项调查，结果发现，相比创办一家新公司，更多的千禧一代认为留在一家公司并规规矩矩地晋升更有利于职业生涯的成功。两年前，EIG的总裁兼联合创始人John Lettieri在美国参议院作证说，“千禧一代正在成为近代史上最缺乏创业精神的一代。”</p><p>其中一些原因已经得到了很好的证明。天使投资者和风险投资基金的故事美化了创业，事实上普通企业家更有可能用个人储蓄为自己创业提供启动资金——就业不足的千禧一代在大衰退期间或大衰退刚结束后进入职场时，根本没有什么个人储蓄。当然，你也可以从朋友和家人那里获得启动资金，但是考虑到最近低迷的经济环境，这个办法的效果大打折扣，基本无法提供有效的帮助。学生的债务也使得经济问题更加恶化。纽约联邦储备银行（Federal Reserve Bank of New York）的一份报告称，2004年至2014年间学生贷款人数增长了89%。</p><p>但最近，似乎就连那些通常能够获得其他形式融资（比如风险投资）的公司，也很难吸引投资者的注意力。正如硅谷Y Combinator创业加速器前主管Matt Krisiloff在twitter上表示的，“自己创业远没有以前那么酷了。”得克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校经济学家Michael Sadler对创业投资日益集中于奥斯汀、纽约和硅谷等少数几个表现优异的地区感到担忧。就像美国政治一样，美国风险投资和经济增长的地理位置似乎也越来越两极分化。</p><p>来自国外的竞争也更多了。中国的风险资本和私募股权公司——以及它们支持的企业家——正在挑战美国的主导地位。在过去，这种投资倾向于美国投资者和美国公司。但据《华尔街日报》报道，去年，亚洲投资者对科技创业企业的投资几乎与美国相当。在2017年全球五大风投交易中，有三家是中国公司：滴滴（打车app）、美团-大众点评（电商app）和今日头条（新闻app）。</p><p>与此同时，在美国，越来越多的产品和服务是在苹果的iOS或谷歌的Android平台等现有基础之上创建的。虽然一款app可以让你在日常工作中获得体面的兼职，但它不会变成下一个苹果或谷歌，美国投资者知道这一点。更有吸引力的投资是在医疗保健等行业，这些行业仍有机会盈利。去年美国最大的科技交易之一是Outcome Health，该公司在医生办公室安装了视频屏幕，并向制药公司收取费用向患者展示广告。前Y Combinator高管Krisiloff在推特上发了一条关于创业企业的帖子，他在附文中补充说，启动面向没有特定行业知识的大学生的“引人注目的新企业”的机会“已经大幅减少”。</p><p>而奥地利籍美国经济学家Joseph Schumpeter最出名的理论就是他在1942年的论文中提出的“创造性破坏”理论，但很少有人知道另一个预测，他认为创新会逐渐成为大型企业的“专利”。Schumpeter预言了亚马逊和SAP等巨头的内部创新中心。他认为，随着现有企业将创新作为既定惯例的一部分，它们将逐渐排挤传统的企业家。</p><p>Sadler说，一些从像苹果这样的公司内部进行创新的人可能会对这一进展感到高兴。今年8月，苹果成为第一家市值超过万亿美元的上市公司。“他们会想，‘我不需要在车库里开自己的公司，也不需要担心自己能否生存下去了。现在一切都在我的掌握之中了’。”但同时也有很多理由对此感到担忧。Brookings Institution 于2014年发布的一份报告显示，由老牌企业主导的经济可能不太可能实现持续强劲的增长。Lettieri还质疑说，在一个创业企业规模和数量较小的世界里，大公司是否“有因竞争带来的创新压力”。</p><p>当我的同学告诉我他们的创业想法时，我们有时也会探讨是什么阻碍了他们创业。无论是学生贷款的偿还，还是大衰退以来的环境，我们还是很能理解彼此的。一些企业家可能会辩称，共有的经历以及随之而来的团结感，将激励千禧一代相互支持对方的商业冒险。这个想法不错，但准确性待议。对企业家性格特征的研究表明，他们在很大程度上倾向于表现的更乐观。</p><p>编译组出品，编辑：郝鹏程</p>
title: 创业这件事，现在年轻人已经不觉得酷了

description: <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">2018 年 12 月 18 日，两轮电动车智能换电服务商「e换电」在北京举行新品发布会。发布会介绍了e换电绿色能源智能服务平台的创新技术，并推出全新M4超级电池和 mini换电柜。同时，创始人兼 CEO 黄嘉曦宣布，e换电已完成超过 3 亿元人民币 B 轮融资。</span><br/></p><p style="text-align: justify;">本轮领投方是中美绿色基金，跟投方分别是KIP、三星风险投资、未来资产，A 轮投资方全部跟进加码投资，分别是 Translink Capital、云启资本、GGV Capital 和韩国现代；本轮融资由汉能担任独家财务顾问。</p><p style="text-align: justify;"><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5108024.html" target="_blank">36氪此前曾报道</a>，e换电推出的“3秒换电”，想要为电动车用户提供“共享锂电池”的服务，以“换电”替换“充电”的方式，解决用户使用铅酸电池充电时间长、电池充电安全风险高等问题。</p><p style="text-align: justify;">e换电上线近 10 个月以来，已于 18 座城市落地超过 1200 个智能换电柜，每天提供超过 10 万次的换电服务，累计为用户提供骑行里程超过 1.2 亿公里，减少了超过 400 万公斤铅的使用及其他环境污染风险。</p><p style="text-align: justify;">此外，e换电所建设的标准化绿色能源体系，已获多家新零售领军企业认可，并与饿了么、美团外卖、达达等即时生活平台达成合作。</p><p style="text-align: justify;">本次发布会，e换电共推出了两款迭代新品：</p><ul style="list-style-type: disc;" class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>超级电池 M4：</strong>重量轻至传统铅酸电池的1/4，普通用户单手便可提起、换电；超级电池M4的插拔寿命超过5000次，可适配市面 90% 以上的车型；通过配套智能微处理芯片，可优化电池充放电性能、确保安全，并能与车辆进行通讯，对车辆数据进行监测、管理；配合e换电能源管理系统，用户可获得电动车精准定位、电池管理、异动报警、远程断电、电量提醒五项功能，降低电动车被盗风险。</p></li><li><p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>新一代“mini换电柜”：</strong>柜体高 1.6 米，宽 0.6 米，可接入普通住宅及商用电，满足多种场景的应用；此外，换电柜具备防水、防火、防爆、防雷、防尘的特点，并配备了异常保护和智能预警的功能，可控制舱内温度，保障使用的安全性及稳定性，满足消防政策需求。</p></li></ul><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18093922/8ubgylsf3wbj88u4.png!heading" data-img-size-val="720,338"/></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><strong style="text-align: justify; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">超级电池M4与mini换电柜均具备与前代产品相同的标准化接口</strong><span style="text-align: justify; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，用户可以通过e换电手机APP、微信小程序、支付宝小程序等进行对接换电。同时，用户还可通过预约换电和离线换电，保障车辆正常出行。</span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="text-align: justify; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">e换电表示，旗下产品均为自主研发、设计，截至目前已获 42 项专利。结合后台的数据及操作系统，能够透视、反映不同区域的电池使用情况，优化运力平台调配效率；对电池进行智能化管理，通过数据进行用户轨迹分析、画像速描，优化市场布局、提升运营效率。</span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="text-align: justify; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">未来，e换电会开放数据接口和换电SDK，提供打包服务模式和对外合作管理平台，让代理商入驻更便捷。据了解，e换电目前实行按月付费的订阅模式，已经处于稳定运营阶段。</span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="text-align: justify; font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">中美绿色基金高级董事总经理兼首席财务官寇日明先生在现场表示，选择投资e换电，是从市场潜力、创新技术能力、商业模式、团队运营能力等几个角度进行判定的。同时，寇日明提出“e换电坚持提高能源利用效率、减少污染、促进中国绿色可持续发展，以及建立能源网络的的项目方向，是选择投资e换电项目最重要的原则。”</span></p><p style="text-align: justify;">e换电创始人兼 CEO 黄嘉曦表示，“将传统非智能无监控且耗时 7 至 8 小时的有桩充电，变成只需几秒就能完成的换电方式，可解决长期以来电动车外置长时间充电带来的安全隐患。e换电会带着公益社会的心态经营这份事业，将绿色能源网络平台建设到底。”</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18093944/qdi3c8h51ic1do6c.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="799,533"/></p><address><p style="text-align: justify;">相关阅读</p></address><p style="text-align: justify;"><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5059134.html" target="_blank">自主研发微动力电池，Immotor 想要用大疆的模式做个人微电动</a></p>
title: 电动车换电服务商「e换电」获B轮3亿元融资，推出新款超级电池及mini换电柜

description: <p>在亚马逊、百度、Facebook陆续推出带屏智能音箱后，腾讯智能平台产品部也上线了一款类似的智能音箱。</p><p>12月18日，腾讯发布了第二款自研智能音箱——腾讯叮当智能屏。官方售价899元，即日起在京东商城以699尝鲜价限时抢购，12月24日正式发售。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">腾讯叮当智能屏带有8英寸的高清屏，有2500毫安的电池容量。该产品使用了腾讯叮当的语音系统和AI技术，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">并整合了</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">腾</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">讯视频、QQ音乐、腾讯新闻、企鹅FM、阅文听书等</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">腾讯系内容资源，希望为用户提供“能听、能看、能陪伴”的智能化服务。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18085519/rrogbaec4fy2y96b.png!heading" data-img-size-val="1268,713"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此前的腾讯听听出自腾讯IEG旗下的智能创新业务事业部，而这次的腾讯叮当智能屏来自CSIG旗下的智能平台产品部。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">与腾讯听听不同的是，腾讯叮当智能屏还置入了腾讯视频的内容，用户可以通过语音直接打开平台热播的《如懿传》等视频节目。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>腾讯叮当智能屏还有专属的儿童模式，包括小企鹅乐园、贝瓦儿歌、古诗、成语、速算、百科知识问答等儿童内容。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">同时，该产品在交互上也有新的体验。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">音</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">箱设备与手机端App之间能实现互相视频通话，直接通过语音发起视频通话，聊天过程中还可以发送萌趣表情，尤为方便家中的老人和孩子使用。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>百度CEO李彦宏曾为自家的带屏音箱小鱼在家站台，而这一次腾讯副总裁钟翔平也前来为腾讯叮当智能屏打气。或许意味着，智能音箱在腾讯内部的权重越来越高。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">“</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">腾讯做不做智能音箱，做不做硬件，怎么看物联产品，”</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">钟翔平说这是公司做策略时经常会面对的问题。那么这次的腾讯叮当智能屏，又意味着什么？</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18085551/y01mjp9rzx5dx4yd.jpeg!heading" data-img-size-val="800,532"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">智能音箱市场已经很热闹了，但腾讯这次布局，不仅代表了腾讯对这个行业的看法，也意在</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">探索家庭里的智能音箱应该是什么样子的。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">据他介绍，主要有三方面的不同：第一，智能音箱要有很好的品质，体现在屏幕等材质的选择上，因为好的产品可以带来幸福感；第二，智能音箱应该是有料的，基于腾讯在互联网的积累，有腾讯视频、腾讯音乐等大量内容；第三，智能音箱的交互方式更聪明，借助AI技术可以让人与音响的交互更自然更温暖，比如可以认识家庭成员等。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>腾讯一直是软件导向的，对它来说做硬件并不是一件易事。当然，腾讯叮当智能屏的研发过程也不容易。据钟翔平介绍，这款智能音箱历经一年的打磨，团队也经历了很多的磨难和坎坷。</p><p>不过相比以前，腾讯叮当智能屏的定位更为清晰。</p><p>钟翔平提到，腾讯9月底刚完成第三次组织架构调整，希望可以扎根消费互联网，拥抱产业互联网。在智能硬件领域，腾讯也希望扮演好赋能者或者助手的角色。未来，腾讯叮当可以拥抱更多产业互联网领域的合作伙伴。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">另据腾讯智能平台产品副总裁李学朝介绍，腾讯叮当AI助手通过AI能力的开放，与合作伙伴推出了多款智能硬件产品，在智能电视、智能音箱、智能机器人等领域已有代表之作。首款腾讯叮当自研智能硬件产品的推出，不仅展示出腾讯叮当完整的AI技术能力，也是AI应用生态中重要的一环。</span><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从智能音箱的出货量来看，国内与国外是百万量级与千万量级的差别。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">整体来看，市场分析公司Canalys在今年初预测，2018年将是智能音箱普及的“决定性年份”，并预计到今年年底，全球智能音箱出货量将达5630万台，高于2017年的3000万台。</span></p><p><br/></p>
title: 最前线 | 时隔8个月后，腾讯推出第二款智能音箱，还带有8英寸屏幕

description: <p>在美国亚利桑那州的斯科茨代尔市，一辆全无人驾驶汽车可以把今年的圣诞礼物送到你家门口。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">12月18日，硅谷无人驾驶公司Nuro与美国著名的杂货零售商Kroger正式推出面向大众的无人驾驶汽车送货服务。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Nuro的联合创始人兼总裁Dave Ferguson说：“据我们所知，这是有史以来第一次面向大众的无人驾驶商业服务。”</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从Nuro提供给36氪的</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"><a href="https://v.qq.com/x/page/f0814vpntga.html" target="_blank">送货视频可以看到</a>，其配送车可以在城市公共道路上行驶，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">车身比一般的无人配送车体型更大，更像一台小型汽车。这意味着它运送的货物体积可以更大、数量可以更多、速度也会更快。用户可以点击车身上的开关来打开和关闭车门，操作简易。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18085026/s15aq02qwidgmtxd.png!heading" data-img-size-val="960,540"/></p><p class="img-desc">图源：Nuro</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>Nuro和Kroger从今年8月起就<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在斯科茨代尔市（Scottsdale）开始了无人驾驶送货试运营，负责运货的是普锐斯自动驾驶车队，有安全操作员乘坐，至今已完成约1000次配送服务。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">但今日推出的商业化送货服务是全自动驾驶，车内没有司机、没有乘客、只有货物。送货车辆除了此前的普锐斯车队以外，还有Nuro自己研发的无人驾驶配送车R1。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">Nuro表示，他们从2016年开始研发R1，所有关键系统都增加了冗余性，车身结构和材料为最大程度保护周围行人而设计。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">目前，该自动驾驶配送车可以在</span><strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">当日或次日交付购物订单，</span></strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">消费者可以通过 frysfood.com 或 Fry&#39;s Food Stores App下单，</span><strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">配送费固定为5.95美元，没有最低购物额要求。</span></strong></p><p><strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif"></span></strong></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18085144/byw1ldpgdbf0zth3.png!heading" data-img-size-val="960,540"/></p><p class="img-desc">图源：Nuro</p><p>Nuro成立于2016年，<strong>由谷歌自动驾驶团队的前首席工程师朱佳俊和Dave Ferguson联合创立</strong>。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">今年1月，Nuro宣布完成9200万美元的A轮融资，投资机构包括高榕资本、网易创始人丁磊、真格基金、Greylock Partners。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">当然，Nuro并不是唯一做无人驾驶送货的公司。在硅谷，Savioke、Marble、Savioke、Starship Technologies 和 Boxbot 都是这个赛道的玩家，并拿到了不同程度的融资，而电商巨头亚马逊也公布过自己的无人送货车方案。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">去年，亚马逊曾以137亿美元收购了食品杂货商Whole Foods，让Kroger和沃尔玛等大型零售商感到压力、并持续加码自己的网购配送服务。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">而这次Nuro无人配送车的新奇和便捷，或许能让Kroger拉拢一部分消费者的芳心。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">目前，Kroger在美国的35个州有2800家商店。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Kroger的首席数字官Yael Cosset说，这次与Nuro的合作可以帮助他们“</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">创建一个随时随地为用户提供任何服务的</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">生态系统”，从而重新定义购物体验。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">但体验究竟如何，还有待消费者来评说。</span></p><p>———————<br/></p><p label="正文" style=""><strong><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">相关阅读：</span></strong><a href="https://36kr.com/p/5165891.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">36氪专访 | 图森未来CEO陈默：我们L4级自动驾驶卡车每周收入数千美元，但盈利还远</span></a></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, title: 花5.95美元让全自动驾驶汽车送货到家，Nuro和Kroger的配送服务终于落地

description: <p><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/fqljS--SOaqdAio9BJFcug" target="_blank" textvalue="编者按：本文来自微信公众号：&nbsp;京房字，（ID：jingfangzi），作者：京房字，36氪经授权转载。">编者按：本文来自微信公众号：&nbsp;京房字，（ID：jingfangzi），作者：京房字，36氪经授权转载。</a></p><p>去年，《北京城市总体规划（2016年—2035年）》正式实施，而总规在区级层面的分解落实，要靠各区的分区规划。</p><p>为贯彻落实《总规》，充分发挥总体规划的刚性管控和战略引领作用，将总体规划确定的目标、指标和任务落实落地落细，市规划自然资源委正会同各区政府全力推进分区规划编制工作。</p><p>本次分区规划由市规划自然资源委负责统筹组织，由各区政府自主编制。工作过程中，各区坚持“政府组织、专家领衔、部门合作、公众参与、科学决策”，充分尊重社会公众对规划编制的知情权、参与权。</p><p>目前，各区分区规划基本编制完成，已经进入分批次公告和上报阶段。</p><p>今天，首个分区规划——房山分区规划开始征求公众意见，其余区的分区规划也会陆续启动公告工作。</p><p>各区将采取网络公告和现场公告的方式，欢迎大家多提宝贵意见，市规划自然资源委将组织各区认真分析整理公众意见，不断完善分区规划内容。</p><p>先给大家讲解一下分区规划是什么：</p><p><strong>1、分区规划管什么用？</strong></p><p>分区规划是北京城市总体规划在区级层面的分解落实，重点明确一定时期内本区发展定位和目标，并对城乡建设、自然资源保护利用的各项工作作出总体安排。</p><p>经法定程序批准的分区规划，是下一阶段编制详细规划、乡镇域规划和村庄规划的依据。详细规划、乡镇域规划和村庄规划是下一步城乡建设的具体安排，是实施具体项目的重要依据。</p><p><strong>2、分区规划怎么编？</strong></p><p>本次分区规划注重开门编制规划，坚持“政府组织、专家领衔、部门合作、公众参与、科学决策”，充分尊重社会公众对规划编制的知情权、参与权。我们将充分吸收大家的意见建议，提高规划编制的科学性。</p><p><strong>3、分区规划怎么管？</strong></p><p>分区规划经法定程序批准后具有法定效力，要坚决维护分区规划的严肃性和权威性。在规划执行过程中，鼓励社会公众共同监督规划实施情况，共享发展成果，共建美丽家园。</p><p><strong>4、分区规划的规划范围和年限？</strong></p><p>本次分区规划的规划范围为房山区行政辖区，规划年限为2017年至2035年，明确到2035年的发展基本框架，近期到2020年，远景展望到2050年。</p><p>本次房山分区规划将描绘怎样的蓝图，有哪些亮点内容？带您先睹为快！</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18085856/uo2iwccjavxw7knb!heading" data-img-size-val="504,6000"/></p>
title: 各区分区规划今起陆续“亮相”！先看房山规划！

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Our goal with Gboard is to help you communicate in a way that’s comfortable and natural, regardless of the language you speak. While the ten most common languages cover about half of the world's population, many more thousands of languages are spoken by the other half. As the <a href="https://www.blog.google/technology/next-billion-users/">Next Billion Users</a> come online, technology needs to support their languages so they can get the most out of using the internet. Today, Gboard offers more than 500 language varieties on Android, bringing a smart, AI-driven typing experience to many more people around the world. This means that more than 90% of the world can now type in their first language with Gboard, with keyboard layouts tailored to each language and typing smarts like autocorrect and predictive text.</p><br/><p>In December 2016, Gboard <a href="https://blog.google/products/search/gboard-now-on-android/">first launched on Android</a> with about 100 language varieties. Over the last few months, more than one hundred new languages have been added to Gboard, such as <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigerian_Pidgin">Nigerian Pidgin</a> (~30 million speakers), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kamtapuri_language">Rangpuri</a> (~15 million speakers), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balinese_language">Balinese</a> (~3 million speakers), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pontic_Greek">Pontic Greek</a> (~800,000 speakers) and many more.</p><br/><p>A quick look at the layouts below shows the sheer diversity of input methods used across the world every day:</p></div></div><div class="block-image_carousel"><div class="h-c-page article-module"><div class="article-module glue-pagination h-c-carousel h-c-carousel--simple h-c-carousel--dark ng-cloak" data-glue-pagination-config="{cyclical: true}"><div class="h-c-carousel__wrap"><ul class="glue-carousel ng-cloak" data-glue-carousel-options="{pointerTypes: ['touch', 'mouse'], jump: true}"><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Bambara_NKo.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Bambara</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Bambara (N'Ko)</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Hindi.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Hindi</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Hindi</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Santali_Ol_Chiki.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Santali (Ok Chiki)</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Santali (Ol Chiki)</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Persian.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Persian</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Persian</p></div></figcaption></figure></li></ul><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate glue-pagination-previous" data-glue-pagination-label="Previous" data-glue-pagination-update-model="false"><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate-wrap"><svg class="h-c-icon h-c-icon--keyboard-arrow-left" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-keyboard-arrow-right"></use></svg></div></div><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate glue-pagination-next" data-glue-pagination-label="Next" data-glue-pagination-update-model="false"><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate-wrap"><svg class="h-c-icon h-c-icon--keyboard-arrow-right" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-keyboard-arrow-right"></use></svg></div></div></div><div class="h-c-carousel__navigation"><div class="glue-pagination-page-list"></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><i>Gboard currently supports more than 40 writing systems across the world, ranging from alphabets used across many languages, like <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin_alphabet">Roman</a> and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrillic_alphabet">Cyrillic</a>, to scripts that are used for only one language, like <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ol_Chiki_script">Ol Chiki</a> (used for <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santali_language">Santali</a>).</i></p></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Building technology that works across languages is important: without a keyboard tailored to your language, simple things like messaging friends or family can be a challenge. Often, keyboard apps don’t support the characters and scripts used for languages with a smaller speaking population. As an example, the Nigerian language "<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Igbo_language">Ásụ̀sụ̀ Ị̀gbò</a>" is impossible to type on an English keyboard. Plus, wouldn't it be frustrating to see nearly every word you type incorrectly autocorrected into another language?</p><br/><p>Many of Gboard’s newly added languages are traditionally not widely written, such as in newspapers or books, so they’re rarely found online. But as we spend more time on our phones on messaging apps and social media, people are now typing in these languages more than ever. The ability to easily type in these languages lets people communicate with others in the language they would normally speak face-to-face as well.</p><br/><p><b>How we add new languages to Gboard</b></p><p>In addition to designing a new keyboard layout, every time a new language is added to Gboard we create a new machine learning language model. This model trains Gboard to know when and how to autocorrect your typing, or to predict your next word. For languages like English, which has only about 30 characters and large amounts of written materials widely available, this is easy. For many of the world's languages, though, this process is much harder.</p><br/><p>In order to train our machine learning language models, we need a text corpus (which is a database of lots of available texts written in a particular language). Often, finding text data in these languages can be challenging. When we can’t find data online, we’ll share a list of writing prompts with native speakers, so we can create new text corpora from scratch. (You can read more about our crawling efforts for these languages in <a href="https://ai.google/research/pubs/pub47206">one of our recent research papers</a>.)</p><br/><p>Next, we focus on the layout design. Layout design for a new language on Gboard requires careful investigation and research to fit in all the characters in a way that makes sense to native speakers. If there isn’t a lot of information for the language available online, we'll analyze text corpora to figure out which characters to include and to determine how frequently they’re used.</p><br/><p>Depending on the language, we may tailor aspects of the layout, like the set of digits—for example, while English uses 0123456789, Hindi and other Indian languages written in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Devanagari">Devanagari</a> use ०१२३४५६७८९. Once we've built support for a language, we always invite a group of native speakers to test and fill out a survey to understand their typing experience.</p><br/><p>To see if your language is already supported in <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.inputmethod.latin">our latest Gboard release in the Play Store</a>, check out the list of supported languages <a href="https://support.google.com/gboard/answer/6380730?visit_id=636779931281375154-2572284319&amp;rd=1#languages">in our help center</a>.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: How Gboard helps more than 90% of the planet to type in their first language

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>From <a href="https://www.google.com/streetview/#yosemite/tommy-caldwell-on-pitch-19-of-the-dawn-wall">climbing 3,000 feet up El Capitan in Yosemite</a> to <a href="https://www.google.com/streetview/#venice/doges-palace">floating the canals of Venice</a> to <a href="https://www.google.com/streetview/#petra/the-treasury">exploring the ancient city of Petra</a>, people and organizations all over the world have used the Street View Trekker to document the places they’re passionate about. Together, we’ve published these adventures in 360 degree view on Google Maps for anyone in the world—no matter where you are—to enjoy.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="yosemite" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic2-1__Yosemite.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="petria" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic2-2__Petra.max-1000x1000.jpg"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Over the years, we’ve gathered feedback from people and our partners who have used the Trekker around the world. Today, we’re upgrading the Trekker so that our partners—like tourism boards, airports and transit operators—can better capture places and their stories. The new Trekker has a sleeker design and is lighter in weight, making it easier to carry. The camera has also been updated with increased aperture and higher resolution sensors that will capture sharper imagery.</p><p>Through our <a href="https://www.google.com/streetview/loan/">trekker loan program</a>, anyone can use the new version of the backpack to capture high resolution imagery to share the stories of places they love with the world on Street View. Like previous Trekker generations, the new version can be put on cars, boats or even ziplines. This helps when capturing hard-to-access places, or when building maps for developing countries and cities with complex structures.<br/></p></div></div><div class="block-image_carousel"><div class="h-c-page article-module"><div class="article-module glue-pagination h-c-carousel h-c-carousel--simple h-c-carousel--dark ng-cloak" data-glue-pagination-config="{cyclical: true}"><div class="h-c-carousel__wrap"><ul class="glue-carousel ng-cloak" data-glue-carousel-options="{pointerTypes: ['touch', 'mouse'], jump: true}"><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic4__Old_and_New_1.max-1100x1100.jpg);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">oldnew</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>On the left, the previous version of the Trekker. Right: the new Trekker.</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic3-1__vlcsnap-2018-12-17-15h14m13s314.max-2000x2000.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">pic3</span></div></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic3-2__vlcsnap-2018-12-17-15h13m37s596.max-2000x2000.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">pic3</span></div></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic3-3__vlcsnap-2018-12-17-15h11m23s146.max-2000x2000.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">pic4</span></div></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic5__Trekker_Zipline.max-1600x1600.jpg);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">zipline</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Trekker zipline collection in action at the Amazon.</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic6-1__Janes_Desk.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">janesdesk</span></div></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Pic6-2__Polar_research.max-1600x1600.jpg);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">polarresearch</span></div></figure></li></ul><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate glue-pagination-previous" data-glue-pagination-label="Previous" data-glue-pagination-update-model="false"><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate-wrap"><svg class="h-c-icon h-c-icon--keyboard-arrow-left" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-keyboard-arrow-right"></use></svg></div></div><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate glue-pagination-next" data-glue-pagination-label="Next" data-glue-pagination-update-model="false"><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate-wrap"><svg class="h-c-icon h-c-icon--keyboard-arrow-right" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-keyboard-arrow-right"></use></svg></div></div></div><div class="h-c-carousel__navigation"><div class="glue-pagination-page-list"></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>We love seeing what people imagine and create with the Trekker technology. Scientists like Jane Goodall have used Street View to research Chimpanzees in Tanzania, Parisians have shared the inner workings of the <a href="https://www.google.com/streetview/#eiffel-tower">Eiffel Tower</a> with the world and conservation groups have conducted polar explorations in the Arctic. The best ideas come from people around the world who travel with the Trekker—we're looking forward to seeing where you take the Trekker, and where it takes you.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: Mapping stories with a new Street View Trekker

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>The holiday season is in full swing, meaning you’re probably juggling a mix of gift shopping, festive gatherings and office parties. After another busy year, the holiday break brings an opportunity to rest and recharge without too many digital distractions. You want to keep your phone handy for taking photos and keeping in touch, but wouldn’t it be nice to properly switch off from work and reduce interruptions?</p><p>Here are a few tips on how your Android device can help you focus on being in the present and spending time with family and friends.</p><h2>Disconnect this holiday season with Digital Wellbeing</h2><p></p><p>In August, we released the beta of our <a href="https://wellbeing.google/">Digital Wellbeing features</a> to Pixel users running Android 9 Pie. In November, our Digital Wellbeing features came out of Beta and are now live on Pixel phones and several Android One devices, like the Motorola One, Xiaomi Mi A2 and Nokia 7 Plus. We’re working with partners to bring Digital Wellbeing and Android 9 Pie to even more devices soon.</p><p><br/></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="digital wellbeing" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/digital_wellbeing_android.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>In Settings, check out the Dashboard in Digital Wellbeing to help you understand how you spend time on your phone and set time limits on specific apps—or use Wind Down to help you get to sleep at night by transitioning your display to a grayscale screen. And on Pixel 3, when you don’t want to be bothered by rings or notifications, just flip your phone to Shhh—an easy gesture that turns on Do Not Disturb and minimizes distractions. It’s the perfect way to enjoy your holiday dinner, distraction-free.</p><p></p><h2>Turn off work with one tap</h2>Another useful tool for disconnecting during the holidays is the <a href="https://support.google.com/work/android/answer/6191949?hl=en">work profile</a>.
