This Android feature, available on personally enabled work devices as part of a managed device program, lets you temporarily <a href="https://support.google.com/work/android/answer/7029561?hl=en">turn off</a> corporate applications so you won’t get alerts or be tempted to check your email just <i>one more time</i> during your holiday.</div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--small h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--2 h-c-grid__col--offset-5 "><img alt="work profile" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/original_images/winteroff.2018-12-18_17_02_10.gif"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>On devices that run Android 9 Pie, work apps are neatly organized into their own tab in the All Apps menu, meaning they can easily stay out of sight (and hopefully out of mind). There’s a handy toggle at the bottom of the screen, enabling you to put work mode on snooze. When it’s time to get back to work, just turn it back on. If you’re on an earlier version of Android, from Android 6.0, you can turn off the work profile by going to the notification drawer and finding the option in your settings menu.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="work profile android" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/work_profile_android.max-1000x1000.png"/><figcaption class="article-image__caption "><div class="rich-text"><p>Apps for work are bundled together and can be turned off with the flick of a switch.</p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>We hope you can switch off from work, enjoy the break and recharge for 2019.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: How Android can help you switch off and enjoy the holidays

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>When a group of 40 girls descended on a movie theater in Council Bluffs, Iowa, the excitement was palpable—and not just because they were about to see <i>Mary Poppins Return</i>s. In fact, the girls didn’t know they were going to see sneak peek of the new Disney movie. They were simply excited to code.</p><p>The students from Thomas Jefferson and Abraham Lincoln High School and Kirn Middle School were arriving for a day of computer science education, and received some serious STEM inspiration.</p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="Made With Code's Mary Poppins event" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Photo_Dec_06_5_24_15_PM.max-1000x1000.jpg"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><a href="https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B-E2rcvhnlQ_a1Q4VUxWQ2dtTHM/edit">According to our research</a>, girls often don't connect coding with their own interests, don't see other girls coding and don’t think they would be good at coding,. <a href="https://www.madewithcode.com/">Made with Code</a> is focused on bringing role models within the science, technology, engineering, and math industries and creating experiences for girls to try their hand at coding. The program is devoted to changing girls’ perception of computer science, and to ensuring coding—and associated economic opportunity created by computer science education—is available for everyone.<br/></p><p>The event also took place at theaters in Boulder, Colorado, San Jose, California, and Douglasville, Georgia, and included a combination of guest speakers and hands-on coding for 180 teen girls. The <i>Mary Poppins-</i>themed <a href="https://www.madewithcode.com/projects/marypoppinsreturns">coding activity</a>, one created especially for the partnership, is a snowflake designer that allows girls to flex their creative muscle while learning computer science basics. The girls knew about the day’s coding component, but got an extra surprise when they were done: an early viewing of Disney’s <i>Mary Poppins Returns</i>to round out their day. <br/></p></div></div><div class="block-image_full_width"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid"><figure class="article-image--large h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-3 "><img alt="Made With Code's Mary Poppins event" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/9T7A4952.max-1000x1000.jpg"/></figure></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Some girls said the event made them reconsider their career goals. “I’d like to create my own cartoon, to be an animator, create a show that shows other girls all of the things they can do and learn about,” Jonnae, a student in Douglasville, said.  <br/></p><p>“My favorite part was being able to use my creativity to code the project,” Hannah, a student from Council Bluffs, said at the event. “I didn’t know that coding could be creative, I thought it was boring, but it’s not!"</p><p>If you’d like to try the girls’ Mary Poppins coding exercise, which is <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QXn3r5plloI">practically perfect in every way</a>, <a href="https://www.madewithcode.com/projects/marypoppinsreturns">head to Made with Code’s website.</a> <br/></p></div></div></body></html>
title: For girls across the country, learning to code is as magical as Mary Poppins

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Our goal with Gboard is to help you communicate in a way that’s comfortable and natural, regardless of the language you speak. While the ten most common languages cover about half of the world's population, many more thousands of languages are spoken by the other half. As the <a href="https://www.blog.google/technology/next-billion-users/">Next Billion Users</a> come online, technology needs to support their languages so they can get the most out of using the internet. Today, Gboard offers more than 500 language varieties on Android, bringing a smart, AI-driven typing experience to many more people around the world. This means that more than 90% of the world can now type in their first language with Gboard, with keyboard layouts tailored to each language and typing smarts like autocorrect and predictive text.</p><br/><p>In December 2016, Gboard <a href="https://blog.google/products/search/gboard-now-on-android/">first launched on Android</a> with about 100 language varieties. Over the last few months, more than one hundred new languages have been added to Gboard, such as <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigerian_Pidgin">Nigerian Pidgin</a> (~30 million speakers), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kamtapuri_language">Rangpuri</a> (~15 million speakers), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balinese_language">Balinese</a> (~3 million speakers), <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pontic_Greek">Pontic Greek</a> (~800,000 speakers) and many more.</p><br/><p>A quick look at the layouts below shows the sheer diversity of input methods used across the world every day:</p></div></div><div class="block-image_carousel"><div class="h-c-page article-module"><div class="article-module glue-pagination h-c-carousel h-c-carousel--simple h-c-carousel--dark ng-cloak" data-glue-pagination-config="{cyclical: true}"><div class="h-c-carousel__wrap"><ul class="glue-carousel ng-cloak" data-glue-carousel-options="{pointerTypes: ['touch', 'mouse'], jump: true}"><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Bambara_NKo.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Bambara</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Bambara (N'Ko)</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Hindi.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Hindi</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Hindi</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Santali_Ol_Chiki.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Santali (Ok Chiki)</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Santali (Ol Chiki)</p></div></figcaption></figure></li><li class="h-c-carousel__item article-carousel__slide"><figure><div class="article-carousel__slide-img" style="background-image: url(https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Persian.max-1100x1100.png);"><span class="h-u-visually-hidden">Persian</span></div><figcaption class="article-carousel__caption h-c-copy h-u-mt-std"><div class="rich-text"><p>Persian</p></div></figcaption></figure></li></ul><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate glue-pagination-previous" data-glue-pagination-label="Previous" data-glue-pagination-update-model="false"><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate-wrap"><svg class="h-c-icon h-c-icon--keyboard-arrow-left" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-keyboard-arrow-right"></use></svg></div></div><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate glue-pagination-next" data-glue-pagination-label="Next" data-glue-pagination-update-model="false"><div class="h-c-carousel__paginate-wrap"><svg class="h-c-icon h-c-icon--keyboard-arrow-right" role="img"><use xlink:href="#mi-keyboard-arrow-right"></use></svg></div></div></div><div class="h-c-carousel__navigation"><div class="glue-pagination-page-list"></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p><i>Gboard currently supports more than 40 writing systems across the world, ranging from alphabets used across many languages, like <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin_alphabet">Roman</a> and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyrillic_alphabet">Cyrillic</a>, to scripts that are used for only one language, like <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ol_Chiki_script">Ol Chiki</a> (used for <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santali_language">Santali</a>).</i></p></div></div><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>Building technology that works across languages is important: without a keyboard tailored to your language, simple things like messaging friends or family can be a challenge. Often, keyboard apps don’t support the characters and scripts used for languages with a smaller speaking population. As an example, the Nigerian language "<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Igbo_language">Ásụ̀sụ̀ Ị̀gbò</a>" is impossible to type on an English keyboard. Plus, wouldn't it be frustrating to see nearly every word you type incorrectly autocorrected into another language?</p><br/><p>Many of Gboard’s newly added languages are traditionally not widely written, such as in newspapers or books, so they’re rarely found online. But as we spend more time on our phones on messaging apps and social media, people are now typing in these languages more than ever. The ability to easily type in these languages lets people communicate with others in the language they would normally speak face-to-face as well.</p><br/><p><b>How we add new languages to Gboard</b></p><p>In addition to designing a new keyboard layout, every time a new language is added to Gboard we create a new machine learning language model. This model trains Gboard to know when and how to autocorrect your typing, or to predict your next word. For languages like English, which has only about 30 characters and large amounts of written materials widely available, this is easy. For many of the world's languages, though, this process is much harder.</p><br/><p>In order to train our machine learning language models, we need a text corpus (which is a database of lots of available texts written in a particular language). Often, finding text data in these languages can be challenging. When we can’t find data online, we’ll share a list of writing prompts with native speakers, so we can create new text corpora from scratch. (You can read more about our crawling efforts for these languages in <a href="https://ai.google/research/pubs/pub47206">one of our recent research papers</a>.)</p><br/><p>Next, we focus on the layout design. Layout design for a new language on Gboard requires careful investigation and research to fit in all the characters in a way that makes sense to native speakers. If there isn’t a lot of information for the language available online, we'll analyze text corpora to figure out which characters to include and to determine how frequently they’re used.</p><br/><p>Depending on the language, we may tailor aspects of the layout, like the set of digits—for example, while English uses 0123456789, Hindi and other Indian languages written in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Devanagari">Devanagari</a> use ०१२३४५६७८९. Once we've built support for a language, we always invite a group of native speakers to test and fill out a survey to understand their typing experience.</p><br/><p>To see if your language is already supported in <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.inputmethod.latin">our latest Gboard release in the Play Store</a>, check out the list of supported languages <a href="https://support.google.com/gboard/answer/6380730?visit_id=636779931281375154-2572284319&amp;rd=1#languages">in our help center</a>.</p></div></div></body></html>
title: Say مرحبا, msawa, mihofnima or hello! to 500 languages on Gboard

description: <p>网络电影行业在“野蛮生长”过后，正在经历理性的重塑。</p><p>近日，优酷公布了全新的网络电影分账模式及规则。优酷网络电影采取会员有效观看时长分账模式，由有效会员观看总时长、内容定级单价决定。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">新规则将于2019年1月1日生效，此前上线的影片仍沿用原有分账方式。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">根据新的分账规则，原有分账模式中的“有效点击数（VV）”升级为“内容定级单价”，也就是说，片方分账收益=内容定级单价×（有效会员观看总时长/许可作品正片总时长）+付费期3个月内累计会员拉新奖励（如有）。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">其中，内容定级单价</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">分为S、A、B、C四个等级，定级从播后改为播前，定级标准加入人工审核。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">S级、A级、B级的网络电影将得到相应的基础推广资源，结合数据、口碑、价值观等表现，通过</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">算法增加曝光；C级影片则无基础的推广资源，直接进入优酷站内算法曝光。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">此前的会员有效观看时长、累计会员拉新奖励则保持不变。</span></p><p></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18083150/ugxzdw17v0taabby.png!heading" data-img-size-val="1278,936"/></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">一直以来，播放量都是网络电影分账模式中的重要标准，这也使分账模式陷入了6分钟怪圈，以付费会员观看超6分钟时长的观看情况为分账依据，致使唯流量的现象出现。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">此次优酷出台的新规将“有效播放量”这一指标去中心化，或许将在一定程度上破除唯流量论的魔咒。除此，播放评级前置，通过“算法+人工”的审核评级模式也有助于打破怪圈，促进内容朝着更加多元化的方向发展。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">6分钟时长的视频点击量只能反应用户观看的初始动机，却并不能有效反应出影片的质量，如果把流量论奉为圭臬，劣币驱逐良币的现象也会在网络电影行业中发生，甚至愈演愈烈。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">为了改变这一现象，各视频平台也在不断出台新的规则。</span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18083206/6lqhztxnxf6002y1.png!heading" data-img-size-val="1408,1058"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在今年9月份时，爱奇艺宣布关闭前台播放量，并表示，对播放量过度关注，“</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">制作公司失去了指导内容制作的评判依据，用户在选择内容时得不到有效的参考指标，广告主也无法对营销投放的效果做出合理评估，行业健康可持续成长的土壤遭到破坏。”</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>同时，腾讯视频也在不久后公布新的网络电影分账模式。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">9月25日，腾讯视频推出了“标准付费播放量”作为分账标准，即每付费用户在付费分成期内对授权内容在腾讯视频平台上进行点击观看行为，记为一次标准付费播放。此外，腾讯视频还</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">标明每部影片都享有会员拉新激励收益。（</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">合作方分账总收益=（标准付费播放总收益+会员拉新激励收益）*分成比例）</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">以此前在优酷热播的《大蛇》为例，阿里文娱集团大优酷事业群副总裁刘开珞层表示，这个项目截至双十一的分账已超过4600万，打破了网络电影当前的分账纪录。如果将这个数据兑换成院线票房大约在1.5亿左右，而2017年有85%的院线电影是票房没过亿的。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">优爱腾三家头部视频网站正不断出台新的规则鼓励优质内容的发展。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">未来随来网络电影行业发展的成熟，内容的重要性也将会回归本位。</span></p>
title: 优酷出台网络电影分账新规，能有效破除唯流量论吗？

description: <p>12月18日，中骏集团宣布，旗下长租公寓品牌“FUNLIVE方隅”，与基汇资本旗下管理基金正式签署框架协定、平台合作协定及种子专案的买卖协定。</p><p>据此，双方将共同成立长租公寓投资平台，首期规模为8亿美元，目标未来3年平台规模超过人民币100亿元。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">平台用于收购、开发和运营核心城市的长租公寓项目。其中，FUNLIVE方隅将成为投资平台的管理人，负责平台整体的投、融、管、退事项。</span></p><p>同时，平台目前已存在一个位于上海的种子项目。项目总地上建筑面积超过2万平米，预计2020年可投入运营，房间数目约500套。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">2017年8月10日，中骏置业与美国长租公寓地产平台睿星资本（Greystar Capital）签署合作协议，引入外资地产基金合营长租公寓品牌Funlive，计划未来三年内，在中国一、二线城市推出5万间长租公寓。据公开资料显示，截至2018年12月初，方隅旗下拥有的项目体量约为10000套。</span><br/></p><p><font face="PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">不过值得注意的是，2018年6月，“FUNLIVE</font><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">方隅总经理陈雷在加入中骏仅仅半年后突然离职，而陈雷原是魔方公寓的负责华南大区的副总裁，继任者身份并未公开</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">。</span></p><p>作为开发商转型主线之一的长租公寓，其实已经在2018年迎来了一场暴力洗牌。据不完全统计，截至今年上半年，已经有20余家房企相继进入长租公寓市场，而上海寓见、昊园恒业等公寓却惨遭爆雷。有人遗憾退出，有人烧钱进场。</p>
title: 中骏方隅与基汇资本成立长租公寓投资平台 首期规模8亿美元

description: <html><head></head><body><div class="block-paragraph"><div class="rich-text"><p>And just like that, the curtain has closed on 2018! While the industry navigated its fair share of changes this year (just like every year before), the holiday season and the promise of a fresh start always work as a natural reminder to reflect on the past twelve months. With that in mind, here’s a look back at the top stories, moments and research from Google Ad Manager that had the biggest impact on our partners. Much more to come in 2019—we’ll see you then. <br/></p></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 1" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-01.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>We welcomed Google Ad Manager</h3><p>This year we introduced <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/admanager/introducing-google-ad-manager/">Google Ad Manager</a>, a complete platform to grow ad revenue and protect your brand wherever people are watching, playing or engaging with your content. Bringing Ad Manager to fruition was a three year project that seamlessly folded DoubleClick Ad Exchange and DoubleClick for Publishers together into a truly unified platform.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 2" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-02.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Exchange Bidding went mainstream</h3><p>In April, we <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/admanager/exchange-bidding-now-available-to-a/">announced</a> that Exchange Bidding was available with new features to all customers using Google Ad Manager. With Exchange Bidding, publishers can increase revenue by allowing multiple exchanges to compete with each other — and with Google Authorized Buyers — in a unified auction. Publishers can now access real-time demand from <a href="https://support.google.com/admanager/answer/7128453?hl=en&amp;ref_topic=7512060">more than 10 exchanges</a> including new partners like Triplelift and Aerserv directly in Google Ad Manager. Learn how partners like <a href="https://admanager.google.com/home/resources/vice-media-boosts-revenue-on-500-websites-exchange-bidding/?_ga=2.191376618.1946149536.1544542456-981197759.1530049503&amp;_gac=1.171101844.1541180602.EAIaIQobChMIwLGimpu23gIVWFmGCh2OdQ8PEAAYASAAEgJNXPD_BwE">Vice</a> and <a href="https://admanager.google.com/home/resources/case-study-rhythmone-boosts-yield-and-cpms-with-google-ad-manager/">RhythmOne</a> are using Exchange Bidding to grow revenues and transform their businesses.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 3" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-03.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>The ads.txt standard made strong progress</h3><p>In July, we put out an <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/marketingplatform/360/new-ads-txt-only-inventory-control/">update</a> that nearly 90 percent of our publisher partners had adopted ads.txt, and that over 80 percent of the available inventory across exchanges accessed by Display &amp; Video 360 was authorized. In an effort to prevent advertisers from buying unauthorized inventory, we also released a new ads.txt inventory control that allows marketers and agencies using Display &amp; Video 360 to run campaigns only on sites that support ads.txt, and exclude inventory from sites without the file. And just last month, the IAB Tech Lab <a href="https://iabtechlab.com/press-releases/app-ads-txt-released-for-public-comment-as-next-step-to-fight-digital-advertising-inventory-fraud/">released</a> the app-ads.txt spec for final review.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 4" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-04.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Industry collaboration led to the takedown of the “3ve” botnet</h3>At its height, the 3ve botnet compromised over one million IPs resulting in over three billion bid requests per day. Google worked with White Ops and nearly 20 partners for over a year to combat the operation, referred the case to law enforcement, and ultimately helped take the operation down. In partnership with White Ops, we <a href="https://3ve.page.link/GoogleWhiteOps">published a white paper</a> about how we identified the ad fraud operation, the steps we took to protect our clients from being impacted, and the technical work we did to detect patterns across systems in the industry.</div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 5" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-05.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Advanced TV moved to primetime</h3><p>In September, we detailed how Google Ad Manager is helping TV broadcasters and distributors <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/admanager/reimagine-the-commercial-break/">reimagine the commercial break</a> by highlighting key platform features developed to enhance the TV viewing experience. We followed this news by releasing a comprehensive research report on “<a href="https://admanager.google.com/home/resources/convergence-of-tv-and-digital-broadcasters-are-building-for-success/">The convergence of TV and digital</a>” which analyzed 20 interviews from top TV executives and highlighted the current challenges and future opportunities. Lastly, we <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/admanager/disney-and-google-strategic-relationship/">announced</a> a new strategic partnership with The Walt Disney Company to power their video ads on the web, in mobile apps, streaming through connected TVs and for live events across their premium brands and properties.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 6" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-06.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><p></p><h3>GDPR required changes to our consent policy</h3>Europe’s new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) came into effect in May, requiring that publishers take extra steps to ensure they are compliant with the new laws and ad policies. Google took <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/marketingplatform/360/changes-to-our-ad-policies-to-comply/">extensive steps</a> to help prepare our clients and partners for the transition and made updates to our <a href="https://www.google.com/about/company/user-consent-policy.html">EU user consent policy</a> that reflected the regulations. We launched a number of <a href="https://support.google.com/admanager/answer/7666366">product updates</a> to help publishers comply, including: ad technology provider controls, optional consent gathering tools, and a non-personalized ads solution.<p></p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 7" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-07.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Brands and publishers adopted Programmatic Guaranteed</h3><p>Globally, the amount of revenue publishers earned from Programmatic Guaranteed deals grew more than 2x year-over-year in 2018 (according to internal data). This growth indicates that both publishers and advertisers are realizing the performance and operational benefits outlined in the <a href="https://www.thinkwithgoogle.com/advertising-channels/video/maximize-media-consolidation-reach/">research</a> we produced with The Boston Consulting Group (BCG) and Nielsen. <a href="https://storage.googleapis.com/doubleclick-prod/documents/BCG-A-Guaranteed-Opportunity-in-Programmatic-Advertising-Feb-2018.pdf">BCG found</a> that Programmatic Guaranteed deals took as much as 57 percent less time for publishers to set up and manage than traditional direct deals. <a href="https://services.google.com/fh/files/misc/white_paper_the_benefits_of_consolidating_media_buys_on_a_single_platform.pdf">Nielsen found</a> that when brands consolidate their direct and indirect deals using Programmatic Guaranteed, they experienced an 11 percent increase in unique reach on average.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="block-paragraph_with_image"><div class="article-module h-c-page"><div class="h-c-grid uni-paragraph-wrap"><div class="uni-paragraph h-c-grid__col h-c-grid__col--8 h-c-grid__col-m--6 h-c-grid__col-l--6 h-c-grid__col--offset-2 h-c-grid__col-m--offset-3 h-c-grid__col-l--offset-3"><figure class="article-image--wrap-small "><img alt="Ad Manager recap 8" src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/2018_numbers-08.max-1000x1000.png"/></figure><div class="rich-text"><h3>Learn more, do more</h3><p>Over the past year we’ve worked to develop and share success stories that highlight amazing work and ingenuity from our partners around the world. These case studies and more can be found in the <a href="https://admanager.google.com/home/resources/">research section</a> of the Google Ad Manager website. We’ve also published dozens of <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/admanager/">blogs</a> highlighting news and announcements about new product developments, events and partnerships. And lastly, we’ve added a new monetization section on the <a href="https://www.thinkwithgoogle.com/marketing-resources/monetization/?utm_source=admanager.google.com&amp;utm_medium=et&amp;utm_campaign=admanager.google.com%2Fhome%2Fresources%2F">Think With Google</a> website with high level content for publishers. To stay up to date on our latest news you can sign up for the <a href="https://getsubscriptions.withgoogle.com/newsletter/googlepublisher/signup?">Google Publisher Connection newsletter</a>, or follow us on <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/google-ad-manager/">LinkedIn</a> and <a href="https://twitter.com/GoogleAdManager">Twitter</a>.</p><p><br/></p><p><b>Once again, we’d like to thank all of our partners for making 2018 a fantastic year.<br/>More big things to come in 2019!</b></p></div></div></div></div></div></body></html>
title: 2018 rewind: A look back at the top stories, moments and research

description: <p>Micrometer 是一款监控指标的度量类库，可以让您在没有供应商锁定的情况下对 JVM 的应用程序代码进行调整。</p><h2>增强</h2><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Auto-configure Kafka consumer metrics in micrometer-spring-legacy.</p></li><li><p>Remove unused&nbsp;<code>Measurement</code>&nbsp;interface in AppOptics.</p></li><li><p>Monitor additivity-disabled loggers for Log4j2.</p></li></ul><h2>修复</h2><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Includes all&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/micrometer-metrics/micrometer/releases/tag/v1.0.8">1.0.8 fixes</a>.</p></li><li><p>Removed meters are removed from Prometheus registry.</p></li><li><p>Remove metrics from Dropwizard&nbsp;<code>MetricRegistry</code>&nbsp;when removing a meter.</p></li><li><p>Remove&nbsp;<code>HttpSender.print()</code>&nbsp;usages.</p></li><li><p>Fix Kafka consumer metrics.</p></li><li><p><code>micrometer-registry-statsd</code>&nbsp;does not pollute classpath with&nbsp;<code>/META-INF/native/libnetty_transport_native_epoll_x86_64.so</code>&nbsp;from Netty 4.1.29.</p></li><li><p>Stop configuring metrics if Hibernate is not available.</p></li><li><p>Fixed StatsD Nagle buffering algorithm.</p></li><li><p>Fix a wrong index when copying an array in&nbsp;<code>Tags.and(Tag...)</code></p></li><li><p>Jersey server configuration alignment.</p></li><li><p>Remove logging from JvmGcMetrics.</p></li><li><p><code>PostgreSQLDatabaseMetrics#runQuery</code>&nbsp;advances JDBC cursor to next row.</p></li><li><p>Tag deduplication now does not add extra duplicate tag.</p></li><li><p>Handle null suffix in&nbsp;<code>CloudWatchMeterRegistry.Batch.metricDatum()</code>.</p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: Micrometer 1.1.1 发布，指标监控工具

description: <p>12 月 15-16 日 , 由中国医学影像 AI 产学研用创新联盟 ( CAIERA, 以下简称联盟 ) 主办 , 中国健康促进基金会、上海市医学会放射学分会、中国医学计算机成像杂志共同承办的首届中国医学影像 AI 大会于上海国际会议中心隆重召开。大会云集了政、产、学、研、医、资在内的 160 多位国内外众多领袖级专家 , 以及人工智能相关行业代表 , 共 2000 余人在此共同 " 沪上论道 "。</p><p>期间 , 作为国际领先的医疗人工智能公司 , 数坤科技获联盟授牌副理事长企业单位 , 并参与企业秀环节 , 以极具差异化的心血管 AI 产品及科技范儿亮相 , 吸引了诸多到场嘉宾的驻足观看 , 进一步加深了心血管 AI 与数坤科技的关联性。此外 , 数坤科技联合创始人兼首席执行官马春娥女士受邀参与了圆桌访谈及主题演讲环节 , 深入分享了心血管 AI 领域的前瞻见解和前景展望 , 尤其是关于人工智能如何改变心血管医学影像的观点和研究成果。</p><div id="id_imagebox_0" onclick=""><div><img id="img_0" src="http://zkres2.myzaker.com/201812/5c18926e622768dca4055ca9_640.jpg"></div></div><div id="id_imagebox_1" onclick=""><div><img id="img_1" src="http://zkres2.myzaker.com/201812/5c18926e622768dca4055caa_640.jpg"></div></div><p style="text-align: center;">数坤科技获联盟 " 副理事长单位 " 授牌</p><p>作为唯一一家拥有心血管 AI 成熟产品的 " 行业代表 ", 数坤科技率先突破技术壁垒 , 利用深度学习算法技术对心血管医疗影像进行智能分析 , 并全球首推原创的心血管人工智能影像平台 , 实现冠脉诊断 " 拍立得 "。</p><p>在题为 " 专心致志——当心血管医学影像遇到人工智能 " 的主题演讲环节 , 数坤科技联合创始人兼首席执行官马春娥女士将心血管与人工智能相结合 , 并向与会者直观展示了目前人工智能领域的尖端算法技术 , 让现场观众感受到最前沿的技术突破。" 心血管疾病拥有巨大的诊疗需求 , 数坤科技真正从临床出发 , 解决医疗痛点 , 已为全国各地多家医院带来了实际的效率提升。" 马春娥女士说到。</p><div id="id_imagebox_2" onclick=""><div><img id="img_2" src="http://zkres1.myzaker.com/201812/5c18926e622768dca4055cab_640.jpg"></div></div><p style="text-align: center;">数坤科技联合创始人兼首席执行官马春娥女士参与圆桌讨论</p><p>目前 , 数坤科技心血管人工智能影像平台已进入全国百余家医院 , 并已真正地进入临床诊断全流程 , 即能够打通影像智能后处理、AI 疾病诊断与 AI 报告与打印的全流程。这种基于全流程诊断的创新实力是数坤科技产品可落地性与临床辅助性的切实体现。</p><p>在主题为 " 人工智能作用及限度 " 的圆桌访谈环节 , 马春娥女士就临床需求及差异化开发等问题分享了自己的观点 , 她表示 :" 临床是医疗 AI 产品孕育的基石 , 产品一定要生在临床长在临床。同时 , 面对医院的差异化环境 , 不同产品要根据实际情况进行定制化开发 , 方可切实满足科室医生的临床需求。"</p><div id="id_imagebox_3" onclick=""><div><img id="img_3" src="http://zkres1.myzaker.com/201812/5c18926e622768dca4055cac_640.jpg"></div></div><p style="text-align: center;">数坤科技联合创始人兼首席执行官马春娥女士发表主题演讲</p><p>此外 , 数坤科技联合创始人兼首席执行官马春娥女士受邀参加中国医学影像 AI 发展趋势及落地应用高峰闭门论坛 , 与各方意见领袖一同探讨医疗影像 AI 产业发展趋势 , 共议医学影像 AI 落地途径。</p><div id="id_imagebox_4" onclick=""><div><img id="img_4" src="http://zkres2.myzaker.com/201812/5c18926e622768dca4055cad_640.jpg"></div></div><p style="text-align: center;">数坤科技联合创始人兼首席执行官马春娥女士参加高峰闭门论坛</p><p>根据《中国心血管病报告 2017》的数据显示 , 心血管病是导致城乡居民死亡的首要原因 , 高于肿瘤及其他疾病。随着心血管疾病尤其冠心病患者的快速增长 , 各大医院有关心血管冠状动脉的影像检查工作量激增。传统的冠脉 CTA 图像采集及三维后处理方法繁琐复杂 , 影像科医生需要花费大量时间精力进行三维重建、判读、评估、审核等一系列的后处理操作。而数坤开发的冠脉 CTA 智能辅助诊断系统可以帮助影像科医生进行自动化三维重建、判读 , 并输出标准化报告 , 将单个病例的处理时间缩短到 5 分钟左右 , 大大提升了工作效能。</p><p>针对性地解决医疗流程痛点、打造高效能的影像诊断工作流程 , 以求真正做到智能医疗服务临床的初衷 , 使得数坤心血管 AI 辅助诊断产品获得了众多权威专家的认可与肯定。</p><p>今后 , 数坤科技将紧随医学影像 AI 产学研用创新联盟 , 一方面与行业上下游紧密联动 , 加速落地 , 使技术创新、产品创新不断满足市场需求 , 另一方面继续以心血管 AI 产品为基石 , 通过医疗大数据和深度学习技术的有机结合 , 不断向全身大血管疾病扩展 , 打通疾病筛查、诊断、治疗和随访的全流程数据闭环 , 为提高整体医疗质量做出更多技术突破和贡献。</p><p><br></p><p>来源：酷七网</p>
title: 心血管 AI “一枝独秀”，数坤科技亮相首届中国医学影像 AI 大会

description: <p>编者按：过去，我们将人生分为探索和利用两个阶段，但在当前飞速变化的社会中，探索和利用阶段已然紧密结合在了一起。在动态的环境中，寓学于乐，利用好奇心，我们才不会掉队。本文作者<a href="https://medium.com/@ztrana?source=post_header_lockup" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Zat Rana</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，原文标题</span><a href="https://medium.com/personal-growth/why-playfulness-is-the-key-to-success-in-the-21st-century-201a626fe18" target="_blank" style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">Why Playfulness Is the Key to Success in the 21st-Century</a><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/06125729/q0heajrhpou3a2ek.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="960,540"/></p><p class="img-desc">图片：pixabay</p><p>牛顿（Isaac Newton）去世后，诗人亚历山大·蒲柏（Alexander Pope）为他写了如下&nbsp; 的墓志铭：<br/></p><blockquote><p>大自然和它的规律在黑暗中运行，</p><p>上帝说：让牛顿出生！</p><p>于是一切都尽显光明。</p></blockquote><p>当你读到这样的历史人物的故事时，你很难想象他们会死。我们大多数人在20多岁的时候都没有发明出微积分或重新定义光学，所以也当然没法为自然研究奠定新的基础。</p><p>但他们也是凡人。将他们神化固然令人着迷，但想象他们本人的样子也同样有趣。</p><p>我们知道牛顿既谦虚又傲慢。在面对自然规律时，他谨慎地从事着自己的工作。然而，在与竞争对手打交道时，他可能会心胸狭窄、怀恨在心——这并不完全是我们脑海中闪现的那种完美的禁欲主义形象。</p><p>我们知道，尽管牛顿名声显赫，但他过着一种孤独的生活，不太注重发展人际关系，甚至可能死的时候还是处男之身。这让你想知道，如果他被那些非常正常的人类兴趣所吸引，这个世界如今会是什么样子。</p><p>然而，我认为最能说明问题的是他生前的一段回忆（据说是他逝世前对一位朋友所说的）：</p><blockquote><p>我不知道世人怎样看我，但我以为自己不过像一个在海边玩耍的孩子，不时为发现比寻常更为美丽的一块卵石或一片贝壳而沾沾自喜，至于全然没有发现展现在我面前的浩翰的真理海洋。</p></blockquote><p>我喜欢这句话，因为它向你展示了牛顿身上孩子气的那一面。但更重要的是我们可以从中为自己找出一些东西，一些我认为与今天联系更为密切的东西。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">玩乐的进化意义</h3><p>一方面，牛顿过着如此孤独的生活的想法让我有些许轻微的悲伤。但后来，当我读到他自己的描述时，这股伤感就消失了。</p><p>在所有被研究过的人类文化中，玩乐是普遍存在的。我们可以用不同的方法定义它。对于玩乐，我们每个人的想象都略有不同，但很明显，在核心层面上我们仍然在谈论大致相同的事情。</p><p>我们只是为了玩乐而玩乐，至少在表面上是这样。它既有趣又令人兴奋，而且不会让人觉得有压力，因为我们把它和未来的奖励联系在一起，这似乎让它更自由、更诚实。</p><p>当然，科学家不同意对于玩乐的定义和它的进化目的。从这个意义上说，玩乐是一种学习的行为。更具体地说，这是一种低成本的探索世界的方式。更深入地说，这是一种对现实真相的探索，我们希望随着时间的推移和年龄的增长，能够有效地生活在现实中。</p><p>当你出生在一个特定的文化环境中，你无法瞬间理解它。当你成为社会的一员时，你必须弄清楚界限在哪里，什么样的规范可以被接受，以及你需要具备哪些不同的技能。</p><p>就像牛顿一样，当你还是个孩子的时候，你四处走动，捡起不同的鹅卵石和贝壳，研究它们，确定它们与周围世界和其他人的关系，然后在此基础上，你开始积累与你的经验相一致的信息，以指导未来的生活。</p><p>关于玩乐，需要注意的关键一点是，因为它不完全有目的性，所以界限很模糊，这就使得你可以重新定义它，从中发现一些新的东西，一些你在履行职责时可能没有意识到的有价值的东西。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">探索阶段与利用阶段</h3><p>这种乐趣最明显的一点是它在儿童中比在成人中更常见。这不难理解：当你是一个成年人的时候，你基本上已经完成了所有了解周围环境所要做的工作。</p><p>基于这种玩乐关系，我们可以粗略地将生命划分为两个阶段：一个以探索为主的阶段和一个以利用为主的阶段。在你生命的第一个阶段，你去探索、去找寻、去理解，但是一旦达到了令人满意的水平，你就开始利用奠定的基础大步向前迈进。</p><p>根据牛顿的类比，在一段时间后，你捡起了所有你可能会玩的石子和贝壳，然后你离开海洋，心满意足地在把玩着手中那些石子和贝壳。</p><p>你从玩乐中学到的东西大多数都很有价值，过了一定的时间之后，你已经学会了如何跑步，你知道如何进行自己喜欢的运动，而且随着时间的推移，坚持做这些事情是有意义的，不会有任何损失。</p><p>然而，在我们对社会和认知方面，这种探索-利用模式也存在着问题。如今社会和认知领域比以前复杂得多。我们的文化正以一种飞快的速度发展，这意味着如果你不跟上它，就再也无法了解其中的现实和真相。</p><p>在一个变化不太快的世界里，短暂的探索阶段会给你提供所有你需要的信息来处理你周围的各种情况和可能出现的决策模式。但是，在一个日益网络化的文化中，每隔几年就会增加一倍的信息量，探索阶段和开发阶段之间已经融为一体。</p><p>牛顿对真理的探索使他一生从卵石走向了贝壳，但这并不意味着他学了新的就忘了旧的。他对利用阶段给予了应有的关注，同时也饶有趣味地留意着周围隐藏的真相。</p><p>在现代成人生活中，不给玩乐留出空间是一种战略劣势。探索和利用阶段不再泾渭分明。随着世界在我们周围迅速变化，它们正逐渐水乳交融。</p><h3 label="二级标题" style="">探索更广阔的领域</h3><p>今天，文化更加复杂，信息更加丰富，现实领域更加广阔。</p><p>玩乐和游戏是我们探索广阔领域的方式。过去，我们只要简单地度过童年和青年时期，不受责任和常规的太大约束，就能理解一切。</p><p>如今情况不再是这样了。我们周遭的环境不再是静态的，而是是动态的，这意味着如果你不努力跟上，基本上就无法和你周围的人处于相同的社会和认知现实中。</p><p>虽然过去探索与利用是不同的阶段，但今天它们已经融为一体了。你不能再用前几十年的时光玩乐，然后用后几十年的时光工作了。</p><p>对我们许多人来说，这种方式是如此陌生，以至于即使所有这些都有意义，问题依然存在：当你30岁、40岁或50岁时，该怎么玩乐？答案是合理利用你的好奇心。</p><p>牛顿捡起的鹅卵石和贝壳让我们认识了自然的规律，这些规律为我们后来理解现实奠定了基础，这样依赖我们就可以更好地了解周围的环境。</p><p>在21世纪，玩乐不仅仅是童年的记忆，它将是我们用来构建和验证周围不断变化的现实中的真理的基础。</p><p>编译组出品，编辑：郝鹏程</p>
title: 为什么说“玩”是在 21 世纪成功的关键？

description: <p>智能 AR 眼镜的光学解决方案主要包括棱镜、自由曲面、光波导、光场、离轴光等等。目前，国内 AR 硬件厂商的主流方案是曲面棱镜，也有部分玩家采用光波导的解决方案。Google Glass 采用的半反半透式棱镜鲜少有人涉足。</p><p>最近，36氪接触到的「阿法龙」使用了 Google Glass 的光学解决方案，CEO 徐培培解释说，这主要是考虑到价格和体积等问题。为了解决光能利用率低的问题，阿法龙选择了 OLED 作为显示源。目前，智能眼镜的 FOV 为 21 °，分辨率为 640*320，参数在同类产品中期不算突出。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201811/30100340/vj9a6ee64figsfmj.jpg!heading" data-img-size-val="720,254"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">作为工业级 AR 眼镜研发商，阿法龙同样采用“硬件+平台”的发展思路。目前主要落地的应用场景包括：</span></p><ul style="list-style-type: disc;" class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>安防巡查：主要包括通过人脸识别提取面部特征，显示人员信息；接入交通部分车辆信息系统，进行快速车牌识别；实时回传第一人称视角的视频，与指挥中心语音沟通信息等功能。已经在四川和北京的部分公安局实现应用；</p></li><li><p>高端制造：主要用在需要远程指导的流程，主要功能是回传现场视频，专家语音或远程视频进行指导；专家还可以使用标记功能指示出关键部位内容，技术人员的眼镜可以同步显示。主要的合作方包括京东方，可口可乐等，目前都处于试点阶段，出货量几十台；</p></li><li><p>二手车行业：应用在验车和交割环节。有些车需要检查底盘，利用眼睛的视频传输功能可以远程验车，目前正在洽谈和优信二手车的合作。</p></li></ul><p>另外，阿法龙已经和神州数码达成合作，和神州数码智慧城市的解决方案融合，预计明年通过该渠道出货将达到几千台。</p><p>阿法龙的特色是在佩戴体验方面做了很多优化。徐培培说，评价智能眼镜的标准主要包括重量，使用时间和准确度。减重意味着材质更轻，芯片更少，电池更小；使用时间长意味着电池续航能力强，准确度高则意味着算法优化或者摄像头优化。具体到某个行业，评判标准还包括对于行业需求的深刻理解。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">目前，阿法龙的 Alpha S1 眼镜重约 30 g，比大多数 AR 智能眼镜重量轻；目前采用普通芯片，预计在明年将替换为 ASIC，芯片由合作方提供；在准确度方面，阿法龙主要采用了自助专利的光学防抖摄像头来减少误差。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">目前业内主要的 AR 头显公司包括影创、亮风台、悉见、0Glass、亮亮视野等。目前市场的竞争格局对于初创企业已经不再友好，新进入的硬件团队需要巨大的成本开拓市场和生态。</span></p><p><span style="font-family:PingFang SC, Lantinghei SC, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, Microsoft YaHei, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif">目前，阿法龙已经量产了上千台，并拓展到了俄罗斯和新加坡市场。阿法龙主要和智慧海派合作实现量产，借助智慧海派的供应链资源和性价比较高的方案选择来控制成本。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">关于团队，目前团队有约 20 人，大部分人负责研发。CEO 徐培培有多年研发 VR 智能眼镜经验。目前，阿法龙正在寻求 Pre-A 轮融资，融资金额 1500-2000 万人民币，主要用于下一代产品研发。</span></p>
title: Google Glass 的光学解决方案还有市场吗？「阿法龙」想落地安防、制造业等多个场景

description: <p><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jDtOQdEtnKSdafCFyf7MAw" target="_blank" textvalue="编者按：本文来自微信公众号：&nbsp;大胡子说房，（ID：moducaiguan），作者：花满楼，36氪经授权转载。">编者按：本文来自微信公众号：&nbsp;大胡子说房，（ID：dahuzishuofang），作者：花满楼，36氪经授权转载。</a></p><address><p><strong>1</strong></p></address><p>2018年12月16日，这一天，对深圳和汕尾来说，都是一个值得纪念的日子。</p><p>历经七年多的建设发展，深圳第“10+1”区——深汕特别合作区，正式揭牌。</p><p>深汕特别合作区在哪里？</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064054/mt626pbmbwcu25nx!heading" data-img-size-val="1080,809"/></p><p>深汕特别合作区离深圳福田中心区有120公里之远，前身为：汕尾市海丰县鹅埠、小漠、鲘门、赤石镇和圆墩林场四镇一场，总面积468.3平方公里，海岸线长50.9公里，人口约7.65万人，海域面积1152平方公里。</p><p>1996.85平方公里的深圳，有了468.3平方公里的飞地，相当于陆地面积增加了23.4%。</p><p>深圳特别合作区这块飞地，已被深圳扶正。</p><p>深汕特别合作区会有哪些变化呢?</p><section><section><section><section><section><section><section><p>入驻深圳市委、市政府派出机构。</p><p>有自己的法院和检察院。</p><p>可将合作区地区GDP计入。</p><p>金库由人民银行深圳中心支行管理</p><p>开展居民身份证、户口本、门牌、车牌、驾驶证、社保卡更换等工作。当地7万多原住民，将转为深圳户籍。</p><p>当地干部同意可划转。</p></section></section></section></section></section></section></section><address><p><strong>2</strong></p></address><p>深圳为什么要深汕这块飞地呢？</p><p>在我提笔来写深汕特别合作区（以下简称“深汕特别区”）的那一刻，我满脑子里想的都是深圳与汕尾合作的动机，想的都是深圳对土地的渴望，对土地的贪婪。</p><p>不出意外，绝大多数人应该跟我想的一样。</p><p>而当我写到一半，我才发现，我们忽略的最大的点。那就是——汕尾实在是太穷。</p><p>整个广东省而言，经济分化严重到几乎无可救药的地步。论GDP,深圳22286亿，赶超广州21500亿，深穗两城GDP之和达到了整个广东省的一半。</p><p>同样临海，距离深圳不足150公里的汕尾，GDP只有可怜的900多亿，全省倒数第二，是深圳的25分之1。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064054/vpq3y0tqsluiuvt6!heading" data-img-size-val="960,540"/></p><p>如果用排名来说话，汕尾的经济总量，比全国GDP排行百强城市最后一名的河南焦作，还差了一半都不止。</p><p>而小渔村深圳从无名小卒到经济腾飞，最后到一发不可收拾，经济所向披靡只用了短短38年。<br/></p><p>更是在去年，完成了GDP超越广州的斐然成绩。</p><p>但，这几年，深圳诚惶诚恐。</p><p>“十二五”期间，深圳淘汰转型低端企业超1.7万家，倾尽全力腾退土地。</p><p>尽管如此，仍旧也没有扭转华为和一众名企搬离的脚步。</p><p>当华为一车一车从深圳搬家到松山湖的时候，深圳的心怕是如同被刀割剑刺。</p><p>华为从深圳坂田搬到东莞松山湖▼</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064054/rkt5x3pgxs9jqsnu!heading" data-img-size-val="608,456"/></p><p>土地的稀缺已经成为了深圳悬在头顶的一把剑。</p><p>深圳土地有限，众所周知。</p><p>7年前的深圳，恐怕已经预料到自己缺地的程度，毕竟深圳的土地面积已经数十年没有变化了。</p><p>深圳焦急、困惑、害怕，也无奈。</p><p>直到——汕尾抛来橄榄枝。</p><address><p><strong>3</strong></p></address><p>扶贫扶出来个南“雄安新区”</p><p>汕尾的经济落后，深圳的土地贫瘠，都是广东发展的困局。</p><p>作为计划单列市、经济特区的深圳，在财政上拥有极大的自主权。</p><p>雄厚的财政实力，成为省府撮合深汕合作的第一个要素。</p><p>于是，13.08平方公里的深圳(汕尾)产业转移工业园顺利升级。</p><p>今天，摇身一变成了——深汕特别合作区，面积也扩大到468平方公里。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/nxoo2iaulmuerdab!heading" data-img-size-val="720,400"/></p><p>仅仅7万人口的四个镇，面积已经达到了深圳的四分之一，千万可见深圳到底有多么缺地。</p><p>起初几年，由于管理权限分割问题，深汕特别区进度及其缓慢。</p><p>但即便如此，腾讯、华润也将大数据中心坚定的建到了这里，并且早在几年前投入了使用。</p><p>已经初具规模的产业园▼</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/sta8devdet8rjlr0!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,750"/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064054/kfq42desb6x88k8w!heading" data-img-size-val="856,587"/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/p2m2wkylusm1q5oo!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,750"/></p><p>其实，腾讯仅仅是把大数据中心搬到这里，而把研发运营团队都留在了深圳东莞，只是在这里留下了一支大数据机房的工作人员。<br/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/d12dqykxwvptd7xd!heading" data-img-size-val="550,412"/></p><p>直到深汕特别区开始移交管理权，深圳放话要把深汕特别区居民、区号、车牌全部并入深圳。</p><p>人们才惊讶的发现——说好的扶贫，竟变成了飞地经济。</p><p>很多人可能会觉得奇怪，为什么不是离深圳最近的东莞惠州被掀牌子呢？</p><p>东莞惠州都是广东的纳税大市，而深圳是计划单列市，是经济特区，财政直接上交中央，所以一般发达的地方都不会给地，除非是像深汕特别区这样的穷地方。</p><p>深汕特别合作区满楼的深企招牌，随处可见的塔吊，全区封停的各种行政手续。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/8gskudmc7nki7z8p!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,750"/></p><p>似乎在骄傲的告诉我们：</p><p>深汕特别区的初衷，扶贫无疑。</p><p>但你们肯定想不到，做了个扶贫，却扶出来一个南方的“雄安新区”。</p><p>深汕要做的是，在产业转移的同时，再造一座缩小版的深圳。而这个区，将会成为缩小版的深圳，也可能低阶版的雄安新区。但他很可能成为粤港澳大湾区下一个耀眼的一个增长极。</p><address><p><strong>4</strong></p></address><p>深汕特别合作区的房地产现状</p><p>深汕特别合作区的现状是怎么样的呢？</p><p>走在深汕大道上，随处都可以看见伟光正的宣传标语，“时间就是金钱，效率就是生命”“来了就是深圳人”“予人玫瑰，手有余香”...这些标语都在对标深圳速度、深圳精神，真印证了那句口号“深圳东进再造一座城”。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/ix2jdjzaslqd8ig3!heading" data-img-size-val="550,412"/></p><p>“世界500强”绿地中心的牌子在这里也特别扎眼，一般人可能很难想象绿地要来这么一个整个区内仅有7.65万人、荒山野岭的地方盖一栋210米的地标——绿地中心，因为绿地看中的是未来——这块地属于深圳，2035年规划人口150万人。</p><p>而且售楼处也快完工了，已进入装修阶段。</p><p>绿地中心售楼处▼</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/oz8i4cr6q0pm3hjc!heading" data-img-size-val="550,412"/></p><p>鹅埠镇建筑物都非常新，很多都是刚盖好或是将近盖好。</p><p>可是一路上，我们也看到了不少盖到一半就停工的烂尾楼，大楼外墙挂着的注意安全的宣传标语已经被风雨刮得悬在半空中了，绿网由于风吹日晒没有养护，也已经吹得破破烂烂了。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/ppxzz3gwgw9h7spv!heading" data-img-size-val="596,446"/></p><p>甚至不少大楼的门口都长满了草，保安大叔也不见踪影。有些工地上，不少钢筋水泥柱都已经被藤蔓植物爬满，掩映在草丛中，看来已经荒废很久了。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/nm7c2j5lc0k2xpn9!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,750"/></p><p>要是在其他工地上，工人7*24小时连轴转，已经是见怪不怪的事情。而在深汕特别区，所有的工地都神奇地停工了。<br/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/igdgzgmqzklbbj25!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,750"/></p><p>而且还有不少农民自建房的主题结构已经完成，但是工地上就这样僵持着，已处于烂尾状态。有的楼层想加盖，但是墙体结构就这样裸露着，目前是被紧急叫停的。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/lo7q4zbmlpfjnp7j!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,750"/></p><p>在考察中，我们看了唯一一个有正式售楼部的楼盘，1万/㎡。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/qyty0g70hbihhjby!heading" data-img-size-val="1080,810"/></p><p>这家售楼处藏在管委会里的楼盘，虽看似在售，实质上属于停摆状态。</p><p>即便已经封顶，短期内也没有可能拿到预售证。于是，已经排号入会的几千名炒房客，只能忐忑等待。</p><p>因为，不仅仅是住宅项目，所有的建设，后续的手续，都需要等待彻底交接给深圳后再制定政策，继续审批。</p><p>炒房客嗅到了钱的味道，同时管委会也嗅到了炒房客的味道。</p><p>除了新房、户籍之外，仅有的零星二手房也被封闭交易。</p><p>哦对了，这里几乎是没有二手房。我们走遍所有的镇区，到访了四座及其贫困的镇政府。目之所及，没有高楼没有城市，几乎全是村落、山丘、田地和鱼塘...</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/hunvyey3c0hgbzme!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,680"/></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064055/fkj5g7plc5acchkf!heading" data-img-size-val="1000,750"/></p><p>因为没有什么商品房，这里并不像某些同行所言：“有大量房产在这7年间，被炒房客爆炒了几轮。”</p><p>不过要承认的是，这里的房产和雄安房产的锁死，如出一辙。</p><p>去房地产的产业新区才是真正的经济增长极，产业、商办才是新区的核心。</p><p>深汕特别区也在践行的这样的口号。2017年3亿出让在商务用地，就在管委会旁，出让的条件十分苛刻，拿地后必须半年内开工，三年内完工，限制高度210米。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18064056/41040h3tbt8txfeq!heading" data-img-size-val="620,372"/></p><p>除了绿地写字楼，已经建成的腾讯华润等和在建的各类的产业园，安置区，活动中心，邻里中心，昭示着深汕合作区的深圳基因正在慢慢浮现。</p><address><p><strong>5</strong></p></address><p>这真是个世事难料的时代。</p><p>当世世代代打鱼至今的小漠鲘门村民还在下海捕鱼，他们不知道，自己的家马上就成了交通门户，和滨海旅游，海港产业城。</p><p>当祖祖辈辈种田的赤石鹅埠的百姓还在下地务农，他们不知道，自己的家马上就会成为了产业聚集区，科技研发区，生态旅游区。</p><p>有人说，世上所有的幸运都是势均力敌的博弈，确实有道理。</p><p>汕尾的海丰和惠州的惠东，惠东距离深圳更近，经济更好，但汕尾穷的劣势反而成了优势。</p><p>就如同北京，向南140公里，画一个圈，把贫穷的雄县、安新三县变成了雄安新区。</p><p>深圳向东140公里，画一个圈，把更为贫穷的海丰四镇变成了深圳直管的深汕特别合作区。</p><p>穷不怕，越穷越干净，越好开发。</p><p>我已经可以想象，没有开工的赤石镇、小漠镇、鲘门镇，在不久的将来一样会像鹅埠镇，大拆大建，如火如荼。</p><p>40年前，国家选择了深圳，这个小渔村原始落后，而40年来，它的机遇无穷无尽，成为人们心目中引以为傲的城市。</p><p>40年后，深圳选择了距离它120公里的这个小渔村，它和40年前的深圳一样原始落后，而未来，它将站在深圳的肩膀上，也迎来无穷无尽的机遇。</p><p>有人说，深圳，是中国下一个10年的风口。</p><p>我想说，深汕，或许是深圳的下一个十年。</p>
title: 正式挂牌！深圳第11区落定，东进大旗才刚刚开始……

description: <p>iView 3.2.0 发布了，代号&nbsp; Lost Tracks。iView 是一套基于 Vue.js 的企业级 UI 组件库，主要服务于 PC 界面的中后台产品。</p><p>本次更新如下：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p>Table 支持 slot-scope 用法。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4847" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4847" target="_blank">#4847</a>&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://run.iviewui.com/50ahQHrs" href="https://run.iviewui.com/50ahQHrs" target="_blank">查看示例</a></p></li><li><p>Tree 新增属性&nbsp;<code>check-strictly</code>，开启后，在复选框模式下，将不再严格遵循父子互相关联的做法。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4872" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4872" target="_blank">#4872</a></p></li><li><p>Tree 的 @on-select-change 和 @on-check-change 事件返回参数新增当前项。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4849" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4849" target="_blank">#4849</a></p></li><li><p>修复 TS 的一些问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4809" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4809" target="_blank">#4809</a>&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4465" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4465" target="_blank">#4465</a>&nbsp;<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4930" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4930" target="_blank">#4930</a></p></li><li><p>修复 Table 动态设置表头分组报错的问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/3472" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/3472" target="_blank">#3472</a></p></li><li><p>修复 InputNumber 在设置最小值为负数时，数值变化为 0 时的错误。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/5002" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/5002" target="_blank">#5002</a></p></li><li><p>修复 ColorPicker 在 transfer 模式下，有时无法聚焦输入框的问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4826" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4826" target="_blank">#4826</a></p></li><li><p>修复 Modal 的拖拽功能在某些浏览器下无效的问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4903" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4903" target="_blank">#4903</a></p></li><li><p>修复 Drawer 多层嵌套使用时，内层关闭，外层的滚动属性错误的问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4831" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4831" target="_blank">#4831</a></p></li><li><p>修复 Select 动态修改 slot 后，绑定的值未更新 label 的问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4626" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4626" target="_blank">#4626</a></p></li><li><p>修复 Select 浮层有时因 slot 改变而位置发生变化的问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4913" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4913" target="_blank">#4913</a></p></li><li><p>修复 Select 手动赋值后，未触发 Form 验证的问题。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4910" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4910" target="_blank">#4910</a></p></li><li><p>修复 Menu 在 primary 模式下，样式不正确的问题。</p></li><li><p>修改 Upload 的 on-form-change 事件派发时机。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/5012" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/5012" target="_blank">#5012</a></p></li><li><p>优化 AutoComplete 的输入体验。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4985" href="https://github.com/iview/iview/issues/4985" target="_blank">#4985</a></p></li><li><p>新增阿拉伯语。<a data-cke-saved-href="https://github.com/OsamaElzero" href="https://github.com/OsamaElzero" target="_blank">@OsamaElzero</a></p></li></ul>
rss_title: 开源中国社区最新新闻
title: iView 3.2.0 发布，基于 Vue.js 的企业级 UI 组件库

description: <p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18040236/g84zm0egxmcgb2qb.jpeg!heading" data-img-size-val="1734,1078"/></p><p class="img-desc">四大无人区之一阿尔金山 @从此探险</p><p>旅行市场近年来呈现出跟团游、度假游到体验式旅行，从看世界到体验世界的转变。户外探险旅行就是深度体验世界、自然环境的一种旅行方式。<br/></p><p>户外探险旅行在中国刚刚起步，在中国占整个旅行市场份额不足 5%，但在欧美等发达国家占比在 20% 以上。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">不过，从相关数据来看，该</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">市场在中国正处于高速成长阶段 ——&nbsp;</span><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">2018 </span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">年上半年通过携程旅游预订「体育旅游线路」的人数环比增长 400%，而</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">户外活动是体育旅游中</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">最热门的</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">类别，占整体市场份额的 71%。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">高成长性、相对蓝海的市场，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">这是户外探险旅游品牌「从此探险」项目发起的原因之一。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">「从此探险」成立于 2017 年，主要围绕罗布泊、可可西里、阿尔金山、羌塘中国四大无人区，及国家级自然生态保护区做探险旅行产品的开发、运营。目前主要有 6 条核心线路 SKU，2017 年全年累计带团前往 30 次、累计服务 300 余人，大多数为 30-50 岁的企业高管、中等收入人群，</span><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">顾客一年内复购率超过 50%，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">公司</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">全年营收数百万元。</span></strong></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">无人区、狂野，对人类总有着特殊的吸引力。但</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">无人区探险，首先面临的是政府监管问题。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">据</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从此探险创始人 &amp; CEO 郝林介绍，他们已经和若羌政县府就体育+旅游、教育+旅游、文化+旅游、合理开发特种旅游项目等方面签约合作，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">遵守《自然保护区管理条例》等法律法规的前提下，对实验区（保护区划分一般为</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">核心区、缓冲区、</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">实验区</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">）开展旅游活动等进行保护性开发，协助官方完善管理体系，规范进入准则，杜绝非法穿越者带来的安全隐患。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">同时倡导、采取非机动类的参与方式，减少对环境的破坏和人类干扰因素</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/18040337/mjfzsl0foxgdwsg7.jpeg!heading" data-img-size-val="1620,1080"/></p><p class="img-desc">《穿越无人区》@从此探险</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">其次，对无人区的了解、穿越经验方面，从此探险团队经验丰富。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">郝林自 2012 年起，有多次纵向、横向多跳线穿越无人区的经历，也是户外探险真人秀栏目《穿越无人区》第一、二季总导演和出品人和 IP 持有人，该栏目全网累计有 1.6 亿次播放量。<strong>拥有自制节目和综艺 IP 也是该团队的核心优势之一</strong>，在品牌宣传、内容传播上有一定优势。联合创始人 &amp; COO 李傲儿曾任 Phoenix Travel 高管，同时负责海淀国际商会文旅事业部。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">在后勤保障团队方面，从此探险由于此前的项目经历，也合作了一批熟悉当地环境的土著团队，包括救援、医疗、运输、营地搭建、司机、厨师、领队、摄影等。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">和同类旅行产品比，从此探险的旅行资源、产品在国内相对稀缺。旅行所至的无人区，是完全没有信号、和外界隔绝的荒原腹地，有雅丹、沙漠、雪山、沼泽等地形地貌，多种珍惜的野生动物，以及古楼兰文化遗迹。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">区别于传统旅游模式，</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">从此探险的经营思路是</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">打造 IP 矩阵。</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">除了上文提到的《穿越无人区》，还有专注于青少年自然教育、轻探险研学旅行的「未来探险家」；文创衍生品「大自然的礼物」，以及顶级特种越野跑赛事「亚心探索」极地越野探险系列赛。</span></p><p>具体经营策略上，由于无人区探险的客单价在 1.5 万元左右、决策门槛高，因此他们也会<strong>设计西藏、新疆、城市周边的轻探险产品来引流</strong>，客单价在数千元，从这些产品导流到无人区探险旅行产品的转化率在 20%。</p><p>此外，类似近期我们报道的「<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5163851.html" target="_blank">陶冶户外</a>」，从此探险也在<strong>招募城市合作伙伴</strong>，通过青少年教育、培训机构、拓展训练公司等获得精准的线下用户。</p><p>关于营收方式，除了旅行产品售卖收入，还有单场的赞助费，据团队表示，目前的赞助商大多数为车企，赞助费基本可以 cover 掉基础成本。未来赛事部分则有可能获得政府的补贴。</p><p>明年开始，从此探险将尝试推出亚心探索极地探险赛、无人区大满贯赛事。</p><p>规划中，该赛事将和各大户外俱乐部、跑团、田联、越野跑协会合作举办，面向国内外顶级越野跑选手。其目的是，通过赛事打包旅游，拉动西部旅游经济发展、提升影响力，同时加深从此探险的品牌认知度。从此探险正在就该赛事和南疆的若羌县、于田县展开合作。</p><p>中国少有匹敌国际的户外赛事，对区域发展而言，举办国际赛事对城市美誉度知名度的提升，以及国民身体素质提升都有帮助，不过从团队配置、品牌号召力和用户规模来看，开展赛事所需要的品牌曝光、市场营销、活动组织策划、后勤安防等工作是很大的考验。在构建探险旅游的体系、规范，以及规模化复制方面也存在不可预期的难度。</p><p><strong>—————————————————</strong></p><p><strong>注：我是36氪茉小莉，关注文娱、消费领域的新鲜事，交流可加微信 Spontaneous-Literary，劳请备注姓名、公司、职位。</strong></p>
title: 体验真实版“荒野求生”，「从此探险」要借原创赛事拉动探险体育旅行

description: <p>36氪获悉，国内智能家居企业<a href="http://www.yunding.cn/" target="_blank">云丁科技</a>，宣布获6亿元D轮融资，由百度领投，顺为资本、SIG、险峰长青跟投。继<a href="https://www.36kr.com/p/5142273" target="_blank">C+轮2.7亿元融资</a>后不到半年，云丁科技再次刷新智能门锁界融资纪录。本轮融资主要用于营销渠道、产业链布局、以及产品、安全的持续投入。</p><p>此前，云丁曾获联想之星、险峰长青、复星集团、嘉实投资、红星美凯龙、百度风投、小米、顺为资本、双湖资本、蓝图创投、SIG、德同资本等多家机构的投资。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/17124250/unf9c2ca9bbc4vyw.png!heading" data-img-size-val="2000,1333"/></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">云丁科技</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">成立于2014年，起初针对B端公寓市场，提供智能门锁、智能电表、智能水表产品以及管理SaaS服务，后于2017年3月<a href="http://36kr.com/p/5068898.html" target="_blank">发布了C端品牌鹿客</a></span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，主打家用市场。</span><br/></p><p>智能门锁的B端公寓市场起步较早，<a href="https://www.36kr.com/p/5142273" target="_blank">由于先发优势、迁移成本等</a>因素，云丁已处于较稳固的领先地位。</p><p>而规模更大的C端市场于近年快速崛起，中国有4亿家庭，智能门锁的渗透率不足 5%，而欧美国家的渗透率已超过 50%，日韩超过 70%，市场空间和潜力巨大。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">这也使得智能门锁C端市场迅速成为竞争红海。</span></p><p>在激烈的C端市场竞争中，鹿客做的怎么样呢？</p><p>官方资料显示，鹿客在2018双11期间，销售额1.83亿元，各类产品销量超12万台。<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">云丁CEO陈彬告诉36氪，云丁2018年整体营收超过10亿元，产品销量近200万台，其中C端占比过半，相比去年增长10倍以上。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">云丁是如何在C端快速崛起的？</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">我们可以从产品、供应链、营销、渠道、服务这几个核心维度看一下。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">产品方面</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，除了功能、体验等创新，云丁非常重视安全问题，包括机械电子安全、云与数据安全、通信安全、端安全等。“智能门锁是家庭安全的第一关，一旦出问题将对品牌产生毁灭性打击，云丁的产品至今没有出过任何安全问题”陈彬表示。在智能家居行业安全标准层面，云丁科技也在持续推进与公安部、住建委全国智标委、阿里云等行业权威机构及企业的合作。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">供应链方面</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，云丁在B端已经形成了供应链规模化优势，因而在产能、成本、质量控制、整体效率上具有优势。据了解，云丁已经与重庆市政府达成合作，将在重庆铜梁区落地智能居住安全生态产业园，计划2019年落地，占地200亩。</span></p><p><strong>营销方面</strong>，云丁借鉴很多新零售、互联网、消费电子的打法，<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">用工程师思路，把营销每个环节的参数优化好，包括投入产出比，流量转化率，客单价，续费率等。团队上，也曾找过运营背景、电商背景、手机、家电行业等背景的营销高端人才进行尝试。不过陈彬也坦言，营销方面云丁还在持续探索。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">渠道方面</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，云丁在线上与天猫、京东、苏宁、小米等多个主流电商平台达成合作，并成为多个平台智能门锁品类的主力销售品牌；线下通过“KA+合伙人”的模式帮助鹿客在全国建立了超4000家网点。陈彬认为，未来智能门锁的线下渠道占比会大于线上，这和智能门锁重体验服务的特性有关。</span></p><p><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">服务体验上</span></strong><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">，鹿客品牌服务覆盖全国260+城市，安装工程师3500+人，46城实现次日装。</span></p><p>未来，云丁将着重加强品牌营销能力，同时进一步奠定产业链、安全、服务等壁垒。</p><p><img src="https://pic.36krcnd.com/201812/17124434/ixaqe9vjphj53x0p.png!heading" data-img-size-val="2000,1294"/></p><p>涌入智能门锁赛道的玩家，包括传统锁具品牌、家电厂商、互联网品牌、安防厂商、电子通信巨头、智能家居公司等。今年也出现多起大额融资，18年3月，德施曼获过亿元A轮融资，曼申云获数千万元Pre-A轮融资；5月，<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5136215.html">优点科技</a>完成1.4亿元A轮融资；7月，<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5142273.html">云丁科技</a>完成2.7亿元C+轮融资；11月，<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5160201.html">德施曼</a>再获过亿元B轮融资，<a href="https://www.36kr.com/p/5160615" target="_blank">果加</a>完成1.5亿元C轮融资。</p><p>面对竞争，陈彬认为，云丁经过多年积累，在整个产业链条的成本、效率上有很强优势，同时弹药充沛（资本）。相比之下，家电、电子通信大厂在单点投入上是比不过云丁的，传统锁厂还在走传统的渠道模式。且智能门锁有联网、安全、指纹等一系列新技术挑战，快速响应的服务模式也与过去完全不同。</p><p>随着竞争日益激烈，智能门锁的价格也从去年普遍的2000元以上，下探到千元级别。<strong>云丁如何看待价格战？会如何应对？</strong></p><p>陈彬认为要区分产品线来对待。刚毕业、刚买房的年轻群体，对价格最敏感，面向他们的产品会产生价格战，云丁推出了OJJ品牌，售价仅999元，来应对这一层级的竞争。鹿客品牌则面向的是对产品品质更在意的群体，这个层面很难打起价格战。</p><p>“<strong>3年内，999元已经是底线了</strong>，再往下的档位是699元，但是很难把综合体验、服务做好，而且过低价格很可能会损伤品牌形象”陈彬告诉36氪。</p><p>由于智能门锁涉及安全问题，占领用户心智很重要，同时未来会产生安防等领域的数据价值，所以市场集中度会较高。<br/></p><p>云丁的目标是，经过3~5年时间成长，能稳定占据30%的智能门锁C端市场，营收做到几百亿元的体量。</p><p>——————</p><p>我是36氪记者陈绍元，关注物联网、AI、科技，交流或寻求报道(不收费)加微信:963757163，请注明公司、职位、姓名，否则不加。</p>
title: 「云丁科技」获6亿元D轮融资，智能门锁行业又一笔大额融资
搜狗搜索推出「三甲医生权威解读」，「互联」病患和优质医疗信息资源

description: <p>36氪获悉，12 月 18 日美学科技体验供应商「六道科技」与游乐品牌「环球嘉年华」签约，成为后者的供应商，为其游乐园业务提供科技互动产品和服务，预计合同期内年采购金额在 1500 万美元以上。</p><p>环球嘉年华的核心业务类似迪士尼乐园，但并非永久驻场，而是做大型巡回移动式游乐场，业务遍及美国、欧洲、亚洲等地区。</p><p>六道科技正在尝试利用&nbsp;MR 混合现实技术、多媒体交互装置，结合景区的实景山水、自然景观，做「技术+内容」的文旅体验创新。据官方表示，团队拥有多项自主研发的计算机视觉、AI 及深度学习等核心技术专利。</p><p>围绕沉浸娱乐体验，六道科技近期筹备的项目主要有三个方向：景区互动夜游、体验式儿童乐园、以及多媒体交互艺术装置。</p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">目前六道科技的核心业务为「景区互动夜游」，应用了多媒体艺术的激光、灯光、投影，以及人脸识别、动作识别等技术，随着夜游动线前进，在不同装置区域／点位，进行人机互动体验。体验式儿童乐园、多媒体交互艺术装置，均为夜游场景下的互动体验装置在细分场景的应用。</span></p><p>据了解，在景区互动夜游的落地过程中，六道科技<strong>将技术实现做成了&nbsp;40 多个模块化艺术装置，根据景区实地情况，融合、安插不同装置</strong>，结合属地文化特色做内容和互动创意。</p><p>据六道科技 CEO&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">刘振华介绍，这套装置比较特别的是，能通过游客的不同表现，让同一条动线上的人获得不同的体验。系统识别、记录到游客不同的动作，产生不同的剧情、互动体验。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">据悉，该技术预计明年年中在南京某景区落地。如果该项目能顺利实现，将解决传统文旅景区大型实景演艺的一大痛点 —— 六道科技相当于用多媒体装置、机械和算法，把传统的演职人员互动体验标准化。此前《又见平遥》、《知音号》等项目之所以高成本、重运营、回本周期长，动辄两三百人的演艺团队是相当大的一块日常支出和变量。</span></p><p>在商业模式上除了承制，六道科技也有其他合作模式的尝试。</p><p>由于景区有延长营业时间的需求，但设备维护、互动引导等有一定门槛，<strong>六道科技会拿下夜间时段的运营权做独立经营</strong>，装置在白天有一定的观赏价值，不影响景区白天的正常游览。</p><p>其实该项目在海外已经有对标案例，此前我们在<a href="https://36kr.com/p/5149095.html" target="_blank">沉浸娱乐行业梳理文章</a>中介绍过，加拿大的跨界科技艺术团体&nbsp;<a href="https://momentfactory.com/home">Moment Factory</a>&nbsp;在加拿大、日本、新加坡等地，<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">用类似的互动体验改造了</span><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">多处景区。据媒体报道，加拿大的夜游体验让当地客流量增加了 1800%。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">景区将夜间经营权让渡给六道，很大程度上，也是<strong>看中了新一代科技互动体验的引流、增加非票营收的能力。而夜游带来的留宿客流，也会增加景区全域的文旅产业营收。</strong></span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">关于其他营收项，在刘振华的规划中，六道科技会从文旅落地项目中，筛选、孵化出适合落地商业中心的装置，输送到商业中心的沉浸娱乐项目里去。不过游乐园、文旅地产和商业中心对沉浸娱乐体验的需求存在明显差异，究竟能否落地有待观察。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;">团队方面，六道科技的团队构成比较复合，核心成员拥有 20 年文旅行业从业经验。技术和创意方面由原甲骨文亚太区 CEO 和原 BAT 创意总监带队，产品负责人曾参与主导多个国家级保密仿真实验室项目，来自划规划师具有 50 多个景区落地经验。</span></p><p><span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><p>最后，关于项目风险。我们<span style="font-family: &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Lantinghei SC&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, STHeitiSC-Light, simsun, 宋体, &quot;WenQuanYi Zen Hei&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;,
